sectionedDescription/description:
FULLY FURNISHED EXECUTIVE RENTAL ~ ALL UTILITIES AND WI-FI INCLUDED!

Everything you need in one place!

Are you looking for a nightly rental that’s just as comfortable as your own home?

If so, you have found the right place!

FULLY FURNISHED EXECUTIVE RENTAL ~ Bluewell

ALL UTILITIES AND WI-FI INCLUDED!

Everything you need in one place!
Are you looking for a nightly rental that’s just as comfortable as your own home?
If so, you have found the right place!

This rental has a queen bed in the bedroom. Towels and washcloths are included for four guests.

It was just remodeled with brand new paint throughout, a new central heating and air HVAC unit, new bedding, new flooring, and more! This rental includes a complete kitchen with all of the necessities, from pots and pans down to silverware, and a full-size stove & refrigerator. We have supplied everything down to the hangers to hang your clothes on inside of the full-sized closet with dressers in the bedroom. There is a Smart TV in the living room and the bedroom, with a DVD player at each TV to watch your favorite Red Box movies on.

It is within walking distance to shopping and restaurants such as Dollar General, Gino’s Pizza, to a local favorite ‘Lynn’s Drive-In Restaurant’, a gas station, Advanced Auto, and even a laundromat. Razor and ATV riding is legal on all streets in this town. You can park your truck and trailer in the parking lot and ride straight to the trails. Great cell service, FREE Wi-Fi, and it is only a short ride to all of the trail systems.

Side Note: You will have to go down steps to get to this one-bedroom apartment style nightly rental.

FREE on site parking is available at the property

Contactless check in and check out is a must. You are emailed your door code the day of check in and once inside you have an extra security door lock.

	3PM check-in & 11AM check-out. Early check-in and late check-out may
        be available for an additional fee.
	2-night minimum stay required which will include all of the luxuries you have in your own home.
	PETS WELCOMED! $100 non-refundable pet fee will be required though due to the extensive deep cleaning conducted after a pet has visited.

name: "The Riverview Lofts" Experience river life.
photos/0/caption: This gorgeous view greets you each morning from your 8'x18' covered balcony.  Relax while reading a favorite book or get rejuvenated for your next adventure. It is also a favorite "office space" for extended stay guests who travel and work remotely.
photos/2/caption: In addition to tableware we provide pans, skillets, mixing bowl, strainer, measuring cups and spoons, cutting board and steak and paring  knives.  There is also a  toaster, can opener and Keurig.
photos/4/caption: We have recently upgraded our kitchen area with apartment size frigerator with separate freezer.  Photo soon to follow.
photos/5/caption: Electric stove and extra workspace on wheels.
photos/6/caption: Dining table and chairs with a view if the river and plenty of natural light.
photos/7/caption: Put your feet up and relax while watching  your favorite TV show or you may just want to enjoy a nap.
photos/8/caption: Brochures of local attractions, restaurants and fun activities.
photos/9/caption: Comfortable bedding with fresh linens, extra pillows and blankets.
photos/10/caption: This mini split unit  allows you to set the air conditioning or heat to your preference.
photos/11/caption: Our bathroom is clean and well lighted. Stocked with fresh linens, hair dryer, and shampoo/conditioner.
photos/14/caption: There is ample space in the closet to hang garments and additional shelving to store other items out of the way.  You will find a portable fan, luggage rack, first aid kit, and emergency light here also.
photos/15/caption: We provide an iron and  ironing board, extra hangers, luggage rack and  basket for used towels.
photos/16/caption: Aww, time to relax.  Is there any sound more relaxing than water. Whether a trickling brook, the ocean waves or our peaceful New River.
photos/18/caption: Comfortable seating on the balcony. Also table and chairs for dining.
photos/19/caption: Our guests enjoy every minute spent on their spacious 8' x 18' private balcony.  Start your day with breakfast and coffee  outdoors.
photos/20/caption: Always a favorite spot. Working remotely? Make this your office space!
photos/21/caption: I never tire of this view! Wild life lovers will enjoy watching geese, ducks and the occasional herring. You may see one of our nesting bald eagles.
photos/22/caption: Enjoy the river view rain or shine on the covered balcony.
photos/23/caption: Awesome view from the balcony.  There are several Businesses that rent rafts and kayaks just down the road.
photos/24/caption: Hinton is home to 3 rivers. Enjoy white water rafting or a lazy river float.
photos/25/caption: Sandstone Falls just 15 minutes away. Summers County is also home to two beautiful state parks.  Bluestone and Pipestem. Attractions include 18 hole golf course, pools, splash pad, mini golf, zip line, horseback riding, nature trails and more!
photos/26/caption: The mill at Greenville. It is a beautiful drive on back roads. Also close by is the Cheese "n" More store in Gap Mills. You can buy anything from jellies and spices to delicious sandwiches. Come
photos/27/caption: Beautiful views around every turn! Wonderful and wild West Virginia!
photos/28/caption: A guest at The Lofts snapped this picture with his iPhone!  A cold but beautiful night on the balcony!
photos/29/caption: Beautiful morning at Bluestone Lake.
photos/30/caption: Great view of fall foliage along the reservoir on the way to Beckley.
photos/31/caption: The month of May in Grandview State Park.  Gorgeous Rhododendrons!
photos/32/caption: The New River Gorge Bridge, completed in 1977.
photos/34/caption:
One of the  17 covered bridges you can still find in West Virginia. 

Local covered bridges:

Indian Mills
Laurel Creek
photos/36/caption: Sandstone Falls, a 15 minute  beautiful drive along the river.  Well maintained by the state a boardwalk makes access easy.  Wonderful photo opportunity.
photos/37/caption: Beautiful winding creek.
sectionedDescription/access: Plenty of privacy as there are no shared spaces. Our apartments are the perfect size for 1 or 2 guests.  Those who work remotely love working on the balcony or in cooler months you can still enjoy the view from inside with plenty of natural light.
sectionedDescription/description:
Located on the New River, this apartment boasts an 8'x18' private balcony.  A great place to unwind or enjoy your morning coffee. The apartment is an open floor plan with a full bath.  Electric heat, air conditioning and off street parking. We are just across the river from the town of Hinton where you can purchase anything you need.  There are several fast food restaurants nearby  in addition to unique eateries. We are within 30 minutes of two beautiful state parks and and great fishing.

When you read our reviews you will see most guests just can't get enough porh time enjoying the tranquil atmosphere.   Some enjoy that first cup of coffee in the morning and others like to unwind there after taking in all that our area offers.  The Lofts are a perfect "home base" for dozens of sites and things to do that our area offers. Two state parks with pools, zip line, golf and more within 30 minutes. Fish on the riverbank, rent a canoe or raft and  float the river.  Shop  downtown or venture to Lewisburg for a day of antiquing and there are two caverns to visit in the Lewisburg area. Catch a show at the Ritz theater or on a summer night load up on snacks and head to one of our outdoor  drive in theatres.  This is just a short list of what awaits.

Plenty of privacy as there are no shared spaces. Our apartments are the perfect size for 1 or 2 guests.  Those who work remotely love working on the balcony or in cooler months you can still enjoy the view from inside with plenty of natural light.

We have strived to anticipate our guests' needs.  If any concerns arise, we are just a phone call or text away.

Hinton is nestled in a valley in the  beautiful Appalachian mountains.   A great weekend getaway or we welcome longer stays with significant discounts.  If you work remotley we have fast and reliable internet.  You can spend your weekends enjoying countless activities and sites.

Amtrac comes into the Hinton station.

Enjoy the friendly small town atmosphere. We have several great local eateries and some popular fast food restaurants too.  If you choose to dine in, you can find anything you need to prepare your meal at Kroger or Save-a-Lot, just across the river.

We hope you enjoy our fun sized cabin and simply ask that you clean-up after yourself by placing trash in the trash can provided, wash dishes, and place laundry in the hamper provided.  If you bring a dog, please clean-up after your dog and should you opt to leave your animal alone, please leave them in a crate in order to deter damage to our cabins.  
*Smoking is allowed in outside areas where sand buckets are placed for cigarette butts.

name: Richmond’s Meadow Creek Hideaway Cabin #4
p3SummaryAddress: Meadow Creek, West Virginia, United States
photos/1/caption: Sleeping loft.  Full size futon mattress with bedding.
photos/8/caption: Kitchen with microwave, coffee pot, dishware, three burner propane stove, refrigerator and ac unit.
photos/15/caption: Living room area with satellite tv.
primaryHost/about: Welcome to Richmond's Meadow Creek Hideaway.  My husband & I have owned our small vacation rental business for 15 years.  We own a full size cottage on the riverfront along with a separate garage Apartment.  Both are open year round.  From April to October, we have three cedar sided cabins also available for rental.  All of our properties are located in the New River Gorge National Park & Preserve, Summers County, West Virginia.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Our Cabin has free parking, a large wooden deck with a propane grill, a fire pit out back and firewood too.
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Cabin #4, our fun sized hunting themed cabin.  Our cabin is 120 sf, roughly the size of a standard bedroom.  It has a loft with a full size futon mattress, a roll-up pillow top mat, (perfect for a child to sleep on), a futon sofa/bed, kitchenette, bath with shower, and a large deck.  The Cabin is fully furnished, has ac/heating, satellite tv, Wifi, and both a fire pit and wood. This cabin is open seasonally April through October yearly.

Our fun sized Cabin #4is located in the New River Gorge National Park & Preserve, three miles off I-64 at Meadow Creek.  We are a short drive to historic Hinton, WV, Lewisburg, White Sulphur Springs, and Fayetteville, WV.  

We are 4/10s of a mile from public access to the New River and to the Meadow Creek stream.

Our Cabin has free parking, a large wooden deck with a propane grill, a fire pit out back and firewood too.

My husband and I live in Meadow Creek and can be available as needed.

Our Cabins are located in the New River Gorge National Park at Meadow Creek.  We are an easy access to I-64.  Nearby attractions include the New, Greenbrier and Bluestone Rivers, Sandstone Visitors Center, Bluestone Lake, Pipestem State Park, Bluestone State Park, historic Hinton, WV, Lewisburg, White Sulphur Springs and Fayetteville, WV, and Winterplace Ski Resort.

Personal transportation.

Our Cabin is fully furnished with all linens, a coffee pot, microwave, toaster oven, dish ware, satellite tv and ac.

As Meadow Creek is a small railroad community, trains travel through Meadow Creek on no certain schedule.  You will hear the trains as well as their whistle.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
We hope you enjoy our fun sized cabin and simply ask that you clean-up after yourself by placing trash in the trash can provided, wash dishes, and place laundry in the hamper provided.  If you bring a dog, please clean-up after your dog and should you opt to leave your animal alone, please leave them in a crate in order to deter damage to our cabins.  
*Smoking is allowed in outside areas where sand buckets are placed for cigarette butts.
sectionedDescription/interaction: My husband and I live in Meadow Creek and can be available as needed.
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: Our Cabins are located in the New River Gorge National Park at Meadow Creek.  We are an easy access to I-64.  Nearby attractions include the New, Greenbrier and Bluestone Rivers, Sandstone Visitors Center, Bluestone Lake, Pipestem State Park, Bluestone State Park, historic Hinton, WV, Lewisburg, White Sulphur Springs and Fayetteville, WV, and Winterplace Ski Resort.

primaryHost/about: Husband & Wife with two sons and two dogs, who live on a farm in the mountains of rural WV.  We love enjoying the relaxing peace of farm life!
sectionedDescription/access: Guests have access to the cottage house and acreage around that home outdoor fire ring with firewood available, as well as charcoal grill and miles of trails. Two ponds on the property for feeding fish and catch and release fishing. Apple picking during Sept and October with two apple trees in the yard, and numerous trees on the property!
sectionedDescription/description:
Come enjoy quiet seclusion on a 140 acre farm located 5 miles from Winterplace ski resort and Weathered Grounds Brewery in Ghent WV! Self check-in on a private half mile long road. Feed the fish with two ponds full of trout,  blue gill, coy, bass and catfish.  Hike or mountain bike on logging trails throughout the property while stopping to pick blackberries or apples. Then come drink hot chocolate next to the fireplace, or have a glass of wine while watching the sunset on the covered porch!

The space is the entire 3 bedroom cottage.  This cottage house sleeps 8 people comfortably.  There are also two friendly German Shepherds at our home on the property inside our home.

Guests have access to the cottage house and acreage around that home outdoor fire ring with firewood available, as well as charcoal grill and miles of trails. Two ponds on the property for feeding fish and catch and release fishing. Apple picking during Sept and October with two apple trees in the yard, and numerous trees on the property!

Hosts live in separate residence on property.

Odd WV is a rural town, off of the Ghent exit, between Beckley and Princeton WV. This secluded farm property  is 25 mins from Beckley and Princeton, and 40 mins from Fayetteville.  Fayetteville is the home of white water rafting, rock climbing, Outdoor Mountain Music Festivals, as well as, many local farm to table restaurants, independent coffee shops and breweries .   Our farm is also a hour from Summersville, Lewisburg and White Sulfur Springs, home of the Greenbriar.  It is also 1 hour from Blacksburg VA.

On the property mountain biking and hiking are good options for exploring.  Miles of old logging trails are available for this. 
From  the months of  Oct- March 4 wheel drive or AWD vehicles are necessary for accessing the property due to the large amount of snow that falls here.

Entire 140 acres are fenced in, so miles of hiking and you will not go off of the farm unless you cross over a fence line.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Must have 4 wheel drive vehicle if you book with us during Oct-March
Must follow checkout procedure requirements.
No swimming in ponds or climbing in treehouse.

name: Mountain Trails ATV SXS Cabin #2 Off-Road Lodging
sectionedDescription/access: DOOR ENTRY CODE: The house has a lock on the entry door with a numeric keypad. Your entry code will be active from 4PM on your arrival date through 10AM on your departure date. Your door code will be provided in your reminder notice that will be emailed to you upon your final payment
sectionedDescription/description:
WELCOME TO MOUNTAIN TRAILS OFF-ROAD LODGING WV

We are a small campground but have several campsites that are ideal for either tent camping or toy hauler/RV camping. Our standard cabin is equipped with AC/heat and full size fridge.

We cater to ATV, SXS, and off road riders who come to the Southern West Virginia area to ride the trails here. Situated close to HMT and outlaw trails. You can ride from camp with no need to trailer your machines.

DOOR ENTRY CODE: The house has a lock on the entry door with a numeric keypad. Your entry code will be active from 4PM on your arrival date through 10AM on your departure date. Your door code will be provided in your reminder notice that will be emailed to you upon your final payment

By renting this house you agree to the following terms and conditions:

REMINDER NOTICE: You are responsible for printing and bringing the reminder notice that we will email to you when your final payment is received. The reminder notice will have the physical address of the community for your GPS, gate access instructions, the door entry code as well as some other important information. If you have not received this reminder notice with your final payment confirmation you must let us know prior to your arrival date.

CHECK-IN is at 10:00 AM or after.

CHECK OUT is at 6:00 PM or earlier.
You must check out by 6:00 PM; otherwise, any delays to the check-out give us a charge by the cleaning company is USD $100 per fraction and/or entire hour delayed on your check-out and this charge will be passed on to you via Resolution Center. We reserve the right to remove any luggage and other personal belongings from the house.

OWNER: Owner shall provide all utilities, furnishings, towels, linens and starter bathroom supplies. Owner is not responsible for any utility or cable/internet interruptions during the guests stay but will make every attempt to have the utility/cable company restore their services as soon as possible.

GUEST: Guest agrees to leave unit in the same condition as found. Furniture must be in the same location as when you arrived. Dishes, pots and pans must be properly cleaned as to not have any baked on food, all trash (water bottles, boxes, bags etc) must be picked up and put out for the trash during your stay and upon departure. Any damage to the unit will be your responsibility. You are responsible for making sure the cabin/home is properly secured at all times. Owner assumes no liability for property loss or damage, nor liability for accidents or injury.

**Service calls deemed non-emergencies where a staff member made it out to the property and a non-emergency service was provided after hours will incur a $75 fee. Note that our ability to respond to unforeseen circumstances may vary on a third party provider.**

The house will be inspected before your arrival and immediately after your departure.

name: Country Cottage
sectionedDescription/description:
Country Cottage is located in scenic Southwest Virginia, it's a very private property with direct access to the Spearhead Trails Coal Canyon Trail! This cabin is quiet and perfect for nature lovers and riders with quick access to shopping and local restaurants. Sit on the porch and cookout with the outdoor grill and picnic table on property. This property offers privacy and security for your family as well as your vehicles & UTV's. Not only is it perfect for UTV enthusiasts but families as well!

We typically let guests do self check in, sometimes my husband does like to meet the guests if he’s available when they arrive. We are here should any issues occur.

The cabin is close to the town but still secluded, a 24 hour gas station and restaurants are very close by.

The driveway is steep, any guest with a trailer will need a 4 wheel drive. Any large trailer will need to park on the flat right below the driveway. A 4wd is typically preferred but many cars have made it with no trouble. During the winter months of snow/ice should be present, access to the cabin could be difficult but parking and walking up is an option that others have done. We just like to make guests aware before arrival so they use their judgement.

name: The Dragon's Den - Upstairs Private Room 2
primaryHost/about: I am a motor head for as long as I can remember and enjoy spending time in Tazewell so much I decided to build my own AirBnB and share my passion with others.
sectionedDescription/access: Guests have access to their assigned room, the bathroom on that floor and all public spaces in the house.
sectionedDescription/description:
Minutes from downtown shopping and dining and easy access to the infamous Back of the Dragon. Only one hour to Winterplace Ski Resort.  Also an hour drive to the famous Hatfield McCoy trails!Each room has a private programmable lock. Each room will have towels, shampoo and soap for two. Newly paved driveway with room for cars and bikes

Enjoy The Back of the Dragon in a whole new way with the Vanderhall Venice GT!  An open air roadster experience like no other available from The Dragon's Den! Available on Riders Share.

cozy 2nd floor room with closet. Queen size bed, 40" smart TV, nightstand and dresser. access to shared kitchen, living and bathrooms. Relax on one of the two porches and enjoy the mountain views. Deer roaming is a regular occurrence as well!

Guests have access to their assigned room, the bathroom on that floor and all public spaces in the house.

I am available 24/7 by phone if anything is needed. I am also available for recommendations on request.

Tazewell is known for a lot of things but public transportation may not be one of them. Everything you need is less than 10 minutes drive away including shopping, dining and activities.

cameras monitor the driveway and front porch.

sectionedDescription/description:
Sleeps up to 15 with additional space for air mattresses on 5 acres with two freshwater streams!  As of June 2020, we now have HIGH SPEED INTERNET. 
The property is centrally located near several recreational attractions.  Winterplace Ski Resort (46 miles), The Hatfield McCoy ATV trail system (31 miles), The Appalachian Trail 18 miles), Burkes Garden, VA (12 miles), Hungry Mother State Park(42miles), Back of the Dragon (23miles), Tazewell Aqua Park (15 miles) and The New River.

This 5 Bedroom with 2 full and 2 half bathroom home is located on 5 acres in beautiful southwestern Virginia.  
Easily found and accessible from Interstate 77 (13 miles) and Interstate 81 (40 miles).
First floor (main living floor) includes the kitchen, dining, den, laundry, ½ bath and master bed/bathrooms.
Second floor includes the living room, 3 bedrooms, 1 ½ bathrooms.
Third floor includes a finished room with 2 sets of bunk beds.
Other amenities include basic cable television, WIFI internet, washer/dryer and dish washer.
Outside you will find a large wrap around porch and large rear deck with great mountainous views.  A spacious yard with fire pit is bordered on two sides by separate freshwater streams that hold trout at certain times of the year.
We now have HIGH SPEED INTERNET

Available for all your questions phone, text or email.

Winterplace Ski Resort (46 miles), The Hatfield McCoy ATV trail system (31 miles), The Appalachian Trail 18 miles), Burkes Garden, VA (12 miles), Hungry Mother State Park(42miles), Back of the Dragon (23miles), Tazewell Aqua Park (15 miles) and The New River.

A wide driveway with egress from a paved county road (Rt. 61) provides entrance to the property and will accommodate multiple large pickup trucks pulling trailers (ATV’s, Horses, etc.) and will also allow excessive room for turn around.

name: Foxtail Orchards - "Hangar 22"
photos/12/caption: Shower with ceiling mounted shower head
photos/19/caption: Kitchen , full refrigerator and mini stove.
primaryHost/about: Rental Cabins in the heart of the Appalachian Mountains, located along the historic Rt.16 Back of the Dragon, Tazewell County,VA. Paved road access!
sectionedDescription/access: Renters have immediate access to the property surrounding their rental.
sectionedDescription/description:
Our cabin is on Route 16 otherwise known as the Back of The Dragon, near Hungry Mother's State Park, a winery and some great family owned dining. You’ll love our cabin because of the quiet serene  setting, the view, and the ability to completely relax. It located near many outdoor activities such as hiking and fishing.

Firewood by the can be purchased upon request, $25.00 per 1/2 tractor bucket or $50.00 for full bucket. Wood will be delivered to cabin.

This cabin rental comes with your own private picnic area, fire pit, mini bar and charcoal grill, microwave, refrigerator and stove. 

There is also a second and a third rental near this rental available on Airbnb as well, "The Fox Den" and "The Iron Horse" is also rented thru Foxtail Orchards, Inc.

Please be aware there is a temporary drainage system installed at the front of the concrete pad, this may be a trip hazard, please watch your step.

Renters have immediate access to the property surrounding their rental.

We are available 24/7 if our guests need assistance. We tend to leave our guests alone unless they need or request us.

Limited to no cell service depending on service carrier. Verizon customers do have some signal. Any other provider, no service. No WiFi. 

This property is surrounded by wildlife, there is no hunting allowed to grow our population in whitetail deer, wild turkeys and the occasional black bear.

ATTENTION MOTORCYCLE RIDERS!!!!!! --- The access road to our cabins and cabin driveways are paved, we still recommend you park at the bottom. If you do decide to take your bike up to the cabin, you do so at your own risk!!!! Thank you and God Bless.

Please do not block any of the paved road with vehicles, trailers or motorcycles. 

All guests are required to sign a liability waiver upon arrival, releasing Foxtail Orchards or and owner of any liability during the rented time. Any persons not guests that is on the property will be deemed as trespassing. Any guests of the said renters on the property are doing so at their own discretion and are the responsibility of the said renter.

Hangar 22 is built in memory of Sergeant Shawn Hess.  Sgt. Hess was killed in the line of duty while working as a Deputy Sheriff for Tazewell County Sheriffs Office..  The cabin was built and decorated in conjunction with his friends and family.  This is only meant to remind visitors to not forget the sacrifice our first responders make keeping us safe, and also teaches you history of Tazewell County, VA.


RECENTLY WE HAD TO INSTALL A NEW DRAINAGE SYSTEM AT THE ENTRANCE TO THE CABIN.UNTIL THE GROUND SETTLES,THERE WILL BE A SLIGHT LIP ON THE EDGE OF THE CONCRETE PAD ENTRANCE. THIS WILL REQUIRE YOU TO TAKE A SMALL STEP UP, CREATING A TRIPPING HAZARD. PLEASE BE MINDFUL OF THIS STEP UP. IT WILL BE MARKED WITH FLUORESCENT PAINT.PLEASE BE MINDFUL OF THIS AND BE CAREFUL.

name: Shiloh Place
primaryHost/about: Husband, Dad, Papaw, Pastor, Hunter, Fisherman, Biker, Outdoorsman.  Have lived in the Mountains of WV most of my life.  Been riding and hunting here for 50 years.  This is our twenty three acre family homestead since 1972.  Come enjoy the peace and serenity of Almost Heaven WV.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: No access to attached garage.
sectionedDescription/description:
Quiet, peaceful Horse Farm in the Mountains of West Virginia.

Plenty of open space. Enjoy the mountain air. Close to the new Hatfield McCoy Warrior Trail.  Unload and you won’t have to haul your ATV/UTV again until you head home.  Many outlaw trails nearby. Right off Rt16.  

If you like riding curves on  motorcycles or sports cars we’re only 30 minutes from Back of the Dragon Visitors Center. 15 minutes to Berwind Lake. A great place to get away from it all!!

No access to attached garage.

Available for questions by phone text or email.

304-320-3627
Twboyd59@gmail.com

Close access to Hatfield McCoy trail.  Right off Rt 16. Enjoy Berwind Lake nearby.  Rural mountain valley setting.  Quiet peaceful place to unwind, relax, and get back to nature.

Hatfield McCoy Warrior Trail is accessible within two miles of the property.  Once you unload you won’t need to haul again until you head home.  If you like curves and ride motorcycles Rt 16 is at the end of the driveway with Back of the dragon only 30 minutes away.

The garage is not included in rental. No smoking or pets allowed. Please remove shoes when inside.  Hi speed WiFi access.  Roku Streaming available.  Please leave money for any purchases.

There is absolutely no illegal drug use allowed of any sort.  If you are caught you will be asked to leave and the police will be called.  Sorry I even have to mention this but it’s the world we live in. One bad apple……….

primaryHost/about: I am a motor head for as long as I can remember and enjoy spending time in Tazewell so much I decided to build my own AirBnB and share my passion with others.
sectionedDescription/access:
Enjoy The Back of the Dragon in a whole new way with the Vanderhall Venice GT!  An open air roadster experience like no other available from The Dragon's Den! Available on Riders Share.

Guests will have access to all shared spaces in the house including kitchen, dining and living rooms along with outdoor spaces.
sectionedDescription/description:
Minutes from downtown shopping and dining and easy access to the infamous Back of the Dragon. One hour to Winterplace Ski Resort, WV. Also one hour to the famous Hatfield McCoy trails.. High speed wireless internet throughout the entire property. 40" HD Smart TV in every room.

This is a second floor bedroom with access to the kitchen, bathroom and patio. Room has a 40" HD smart TV and WiFi enabling you to use your favorite streaming app. Enjoy the entire home including kitchen, 2 bathrooms and front and back porches.

Enjoy The Back of the Dragon in a whole new way with the Vanderhall Venice GT!  An open air roadster experience like no other available from The Dragon's Den! Available on Riders Share.

Guests will have access to all shared spaces in the house including kitchen, dining and living rooms along with outdoor spaces.

Either myself or someone that works with me will be available 24/7 during your stay making sure it is comfortable and relaxing.

Come explore historic downtown Tazewell, VA and everything it has to offer. Walking distance to breweries and restaurants, Tazewell is a beautiful place to relax and call home for the weekend.

Not much public transportation so a car/motorcycle is required.

The house is on a septic system.  Only the provided toilet paper can be flushed.  All other items need to be disposed of in provided bins.  There will be an additional fee of $25 for use of the airbed or pull out couch.

cameras monitor the driveway and front porch.

sectionedDescription/description: Highwater Inn is conveniently located in Mullens just a little over one mile from The Hatfield-McCoy trail system and the newly constructed Coal Fields Expressway.  The inn accommodates up to 10 guests and provides free Wifi, a kitchen, three showers, two decks, and an outdoor area with a picnic table, chairs, and fire pit .  Parking is plentiful for several vehicles, ATVs, and trailers with gas available just a few hundred yards away.  Multiple restaurants are just a short ride or walk away.

name: The Red Cabin at Wood Mountain Campground
p3SummaryAddress: Glen Jean, West Virginia, United States
photos/0/caption: Large front porch, with comfortable seating.
primaryHost/about: I love being outside, and I love being in cabins or spaces with a view of the sky, the grass, the trees. I try to make sure all of my rentals are places I would stay or live in too.
sectionedDescription/access: The entire cabin is yours exclusively, with 2 bedrooms, 1 bath (a bathhouse on site is also available for use), a furnished kitchen with stove, oven, frig, microwave, dishes, cutlery, bakeware, etc. There is a large front porch with rocking chairs and adirondack chairs and small tables, as well as drying racks for any wet clothes if you visit the river.
sectionedDescription/description:
The Red Cabin. In the heart of the New River Gorge recreation area of West Virginia, we are minutes from I-64/I-77, Beckley and the small town of Fayetteville that is easy to fall in love with. Our cozy 2 BR cabins are brand new, very clean, big front porches, great decor, fully furnished including a kitchen, fire pits, and 5 acres of  campground space. Convenient to whitewater rafting, hiking, historical sites, national and state parks, great local restaurants and more!

On 5 acres on a hill overlooking the valley, this is Wood Mountain Campground. We are a small campground with 3 cabins, 4 RV spots, and tent camping, spread out across rolling grass. In addition to fire pits and scenic views, West Virginia Adventures rafting has a small outpost on site, if you are in the mood for a gentle float trip, a classic whitewater trip, or something even more adventurous.

The entire cabin is yours exclusively, with 2 bedrooms, 1 bath (a bathhouse on site is also available for use), a furnished kitchen with stove, oven, frig, microwave, dishes, cutlery, bakeware, etc. There is a large front porch with rocking chairs and adirondack chairs and small tables, as well as drying racks for any wet clothes if you visit the river.

We live close, are on and off property as needed, or as requested!

We are up on a hill, overlooking this recreational mecca, with easy access to Fayetteville, Beckley, New River Gorge National Park, Winterplace Ski Resort, Summersville Lake, Gauley River, and more!

Cars, trucks, RVs, motorcycles, bicycles, boats - it's all good!
sectionedDescription/interaction: We live close, are on and off property as needed, or as requested!

additionalHouseRules:
PLEASE HONOR 10AM CHECK-OUT
The cleaning attendant will arrive based on scheduled check-out time.

No smoking inside the cabin.  Cigarette butts must be disposed of in the bucket provided on the front porch.

Please be attentive to your pets and dispose of any waste from them in the immediate, non-wooded area of the yard to avoid forfeit of the deposit.

Please do not allow pets on the furniture to avoid a forfeit of the deposit.

Please do not leave pet unattended while you are away from the cabin.

Please clean up excess dog hair or accident they may have in the house to avoid forfeit of the deposit.

Please DO NOT park on the grass to avoid forfeit of deposit.

No parties or events; Guests should leave premises in neat and undamaged condition.

Please RETURN ANY MOVED INDOOR OR OUTDOOR FURNITURE to its original location to avoid forfeit of deposit.
 
Please strip the beds before your departure.

No unregistered guests allowed, please adhere to property’s stated capacity.
 
Please respect the local noise ordinance of quiet time after 10p.m.

Please do not use grill up next to or on the front porch of the cabins.

Please wash and put away dishes before checkout.

Please remove all food from the refrigerator and cabinets before checkout.

Please dispose of all trash and place in the outdoor bins beside garage. 

Please report any damages and/or breakages in a reasonably timely manner.

rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
The Lodge on Little Creek is just a 15-minute drive from Wytheville, VA, off I-77. Although this beautiful property isn't far from restaurants and stores you will feel like you are a world away. This 3400 sq foot, 4 bedroom, 3 bath home is situated on 53 private acres bordering the Jefferson National Forest.   Enjoy private trails throughout the property. When daylight fades share stories with your family around a roaring campfire.   The lodge has a new filtration system for sulfur-free water.

The lodge has 4 bedrooms and a spacious loft overlooking the living room with full size bed, twin trundle bed and futon.  There is a bedroom upstairs with twin and toddler bed.  The king size master bedroom upstairs has a private bathroom.  The second king size bedroom located downstairs overlooks the creek as well as another bedroom downstairs with a full size bed.  The game room on the first floor has a futon sofa bed.

We are in a rural location; cell phone service is limited but we do have Hughesnet Satellite wi-fi, it doesn't stream video but allows for surfing the web, answering emails, wi-fi texting and calling(depending on you cell phone carrier plan).

As like many people in rural America we are on a well water system so the water has Sulphur, which is completely safe to drink and bath in but does have a Sulphur smell and is an acquired taste.  We supply a gallon of water but suggest our guests bring extra water for drinking due to the taste.

We are one hour from Virginia Tech in Blacksburg, VA and 55 minutes to Radford University.

We are pet friendly with lots of room for your pets to explore.
We charge a pet fee of $25 for the first pet per stay and $10 for each additional pet per stay. 

The pet fee is collected separately through AirBNB after the cabin is booked.

* Don't forget to bring your water shoes, folding chairs, beach towels and sunscreen.

***Please read below***

*The lodge has a neighboring cottage for rent on Airbnb, approximately 70 feet from the lodge called The Cottage on Little Creek (please see gallery for photo that shows proximity.


* Wi-Fi: 
As mentioned above, this is a rural location which is great to decompress and find peace and quiet but high-speed internet isn’t available in this area. We provide satellite internet, so guests can use Wi-Fi texting and calling (dependent on your cell provider- cell phone service is very limited), check emails and surf the web but streaming Netflix and downloading music unfortunately don’t work.  We have the highest number of gigabytes available with HughesNet Satellite but once the data caps are reached (which is easy to do if streaming is tried and continues to buffer) the internet eventually stops.  We ask you to please be conscientious with the internet usage, so all our guests are able to use it throughout their stay with us.

This place is so special, and we want our guests to love it as much as we do so if there is anything we can do throughout your stay we are happy to help.

sectionedDescription/description:
Hello, River 2 Ridge Outfitters is a newly remodeled 3 BR, 2 Bath house. We can accommodate up to 12 people in beds. Full kitchen, LR, dining room, washer/dryer, garage mud room, fire pit, SXS wash station, covered storage, and free WiFi.  Perfect location in southern WV to ride/hike the beautiful mountains. We are approximately 1.5 miles from trails that link with HM Trail system (Buffalo Mtn)accessible from lodge, so you don’t have to trailer machines.Any questions contact us at 304-784-1719.

8 miles from Williamson, WV 
With several restaurants in the area.

We are available 24/7 for our guests

name: Campside Cottage
photos/1/caption:
The kitchen is fully stocked with stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, dishes, glasses, pots, pans, electric skillet, baking sheets, coffee station (uses K-cups or drip coffee)
Provided:  Coffee (K-cups), Sugar, Salt, Pepper, Oil.
photos/2/caption: Other items provided:  Cooking utensils, silverware, dishtowels, dish detergent.
photos/5/caption: Couch pulls out to a double (memory foam)bed for young children.
photos/6/caption: Smart TV w/ Wifi for streaming your favorite shows/movies!
photos/12/caption: Travel sized soap, shampoo, conditioner provided.
photos/13/caption:
Front of the house. Entrance to Campside Cottage is to the right (upstairs). Entrance to The Lake House is to the left—at the back of the house. Separate parking for each unit. 
No access between units. 
Quiet hours are 10:00 pm-8:00 am.
photos/14/caption: Campside Cottage is the upstairs unit. Downstairs is The Lake House—a 2 bedroom/1 bath Airbnb rental.
photos/15/caption: The lockbox code will be sent to you, and you have to put in the code again to close it.
photos/16/caption: Fire pit and seating for Campside Cottage.
photos/17/caption: Plenty of parking (and close to the stairs). Camp Burson is across the road. Lake trails are easily accessed from Campside Cottage!
photos/19/caption: Hungry Mother State Park rents canoes, paddleboats, kayaks, paddleboards.
photos/23/caption: If you are a motorcycle enthusiast and want to try the Back of the Dragon, or just a short drive leads you to a scenic overlook of beautiful Rich Valley, but no worries…this is not the road you have to travel to get to Hungry Mother!
photos/25/caption: Scenic Overlook-4.5 miles from Campside Cottage.
primaryHost/about: Welcome! We are glad to host you during your stay at Hungry Mother State Park!
sectionedDescription/access:
Access to the lake trail is located directly across from the property. The Clyburn trail is adjacent to the property. 

In addition to the hiking and biking trails of Hungry Mother Park, there is a beach area (with concessions), a gift shop (inside the park and at Camp Burson), playground areas, canoe, paddle boat, kayak, and paddle board rentals.
sectionedDescription/description:
Campside Cottage--a vacation retreat located across from Camp Burson at the entrance of Hungry Mother State Park in Marion, Virginia.  Relax around the campfire,  hike or bike the many trails.  Lounge on the beach with a good book, or cast your line to catch a big one!  Enjoy the beautiful views of the Appalachian mountains while paddleboarding or kayaking Hungry Mother Lake.  Don't forget to go shopping or sample the restaurants of America's Coolest Hometown!  Enjoy your stay!

Campside Cottage is a clean, newly- renovated modern farmhouse style retreat. It is an upstairs unit with a separate entrance (the downstairs is also a vacation rental with a separate entrance located at the opposite end of the house). There is a very large backyard (field) that kids can play in, and the driveway is perfect for bike riding. There is plenty of parking and you can enjoy the flicker of campfires from the campground across the road while having your own large, private area to yourself. There is a fire pit and outdoor seating area, plus a grill (both gas and charcoal provided) for outdoor cooking. The Campside Cottage is perfect for the couple looking to get away for a few days, or for the young family with small children.  Parents and guests of Emory & Henry Health Sciences students--we are located 2 miles from the Marion campus and would love to host you when you visit!

Access to the lake trail is located directly across from the property. The Clyburn trail is adjacent to the property. 

In addition to the hiking and biking trails of Hungry Mother Park, there is a beach area (with concessions), a gift shop (inside the park and at Camp Burson), playground areas, canoe, paddle boat, kayak, and paddle board rentals.

Guests will have complete privacy with self check-in. A lockbox allows flexibility for guests’ arrival times. A code will be sent to you prior to check-in. There is a list of instructions located within the cottage regarding check-out. Host phone numbers are located inside the rental. 

Message me on the Airbnb app or text/call me if there are any issues or anything that you need help with. I will respond promptly in order to ensure that you to have the best stay possible!!!

Check out the online Guidebook!

Campside Cottage is located at the entrance to Hungry Mother State Park, directly across from Camp Burson campground. Situated on 3.5 acres, there is plenty of privacy. Also, located on the property is the downstairs of this unit (also a vacation rental) as well as two additional vacation rentals (The Berry Cabin and Dreamer’s Lodge). Our property (@ the lake) ends at the fence at the back of the 3.5 acres. Beyond this fence is our neighbors…please respect their privacy! :)

Plenty of parking on site. The neighborhood is very quiet and very safe.

Downtown Marion has many excellent restaurants (Mi Puerto, Macados, Wooden Pickle, Moondog, Sisters’ Cafe & Gifts, Sur 81 to name a few, as well as many fast-food chains) and shopping (Blue Ridge Outfitters, Marion Outdoors, Army/Navy Store, Just Believe Boutique, The Daisy Boutique, Willbeez Country Store and Deli, The Toy Box and others). 

Take in a movie, or a game of putt-putt at Park Place Drive-In. Grab an ice-cream at Park Place or some fudge at Willbeez Country Store and Deli. Enjoy a cup of coffee or some pastry at Better Coffee Co. or Starbucks. 


Marion’s own Lincoln Theatre, one of the last remaining Mayan Revival style theaters in the world, provides a variety of performing arts events. 

And just a short drive away…Barter Theatre, Wohlfahrt Haus Dinner Theatre, Grayson Highlands Park, The Virginia Creeper Trail, Bristol Raceway, Pinnacle Shopping Center, The Back of the Dragon, the Appalachian Trail.

name: Hillbilly Hideout
photos/0/caption: Open floorplan complete with game room & full kitchen! Includes custom chess/checkerboard, pool table, pac man arcade game, dart board, cornhole boards and massaging recliner! Yes, you heard that right! A massaging recliner!!
sectionedDescription/access: You will get the entire place to yourself!
sectionedDescription/description:
Whether you're looking to ride the Hatfield-McCoy Trails or plan a weekend getaway, this cabin is perfect for you!
Hillbilly Hideout is located in historical downtown Williamson, just 0.3 miles from the Trail #10 connector. If you get rained out, no worries! Take advantage of the GAME ROOM equipped with a pool table, pac-man, checkers, darts, cornhole boards and Foosball table or sit back and relax in our massaging recliner.

We're also available on Facebook!

Hillbilly Hideout is a newly renovated rental unit with plenty of space for your family or closest friends! The large open concept features 2 bedrooms with a full-size bed and twin bunks in one room and queen size bed and twin bunks in the other. 

It also has a full kitchen equipped with a stove/oven, microwave,  keurig, coffee pot, utensils, pots/pans, etc. , a large living area, dining room and game room for your entertainment.

Outside, you can sit and relax around the fire pit or grill your favorites with a large charcoal grill located under the gazebo.

You will get the entire place to yourself!

Someone is always available! Just call/text Grady (304-928-0484) or Danielle (304-928-7582).

We are located right in the middle of historic downtown Williamson, WV.

There are several locally owned restaurants and gas stations within walking distance for your convenience!

Williamson is ATV friendly, so feel free to ride your SXS right in town, walk and enjoy the scenery or drive to any of your local restaurants or gas stations. 

You can drive just a few miles up the road to access your favorite chain restaurants or grocery stores/Walmart.

We will send you a message with complete check-in/out instructions in addition to your custom code for keyless entry prior to your scheduled arrival.

Check-in: 3:00pm or after
Check-out: 11:00am

We always do our best to accommodate our guests. If available, we allow early check-in and/or late check-out at no additional cost! Just give us a call prior to your arrival.

sectionedDescription/description:
Plan your unplugged (there is CELL SERVICE) getaway in our recently renovated, stylish, mountaintop cabin! Sleeps six to eight on two levels with plenty of room to congregate and also enjoy some well-earned solitude. Fish from the dock, hike the trails, or enjoy a bit of hunting on our one hundred acres of game filled mountainside!

We live on the adjoining property. I'm available by text or call!

Rural area. Near an AT trailhead. Large Amish store within 5 minute drive.

name: Samuel’s Hilltop ATV Lodging, LLC
sectionedDescription/description:
Our place is private. We offer 3 queen beds, 1 twin bed, and  1 queen and 2 twin air mattresses. . Located two miles from Trailhead 10 and we are close to Williamson park and ride.
Our 2nd bathroom is the mud room. Guests don’t have to worry about that mud. Take a hot shower and wash your clothes. 
We offer a full kitchen or a grill to cook on. There is a fire pit to relax of the evening. Southside mall is only two miles away and the best eating is right here in Williamson area.

We are within walking distance of our rental property. Should the guests have issues or need anything, we are very close by.

Southside mall and wal mart is 3 miles away.

Please be sure to check out our special winter pricing!

photos/13/caption: Gravel driveway with plenty of parking
photos/15/caption: 1 acre flat elevated lot with privacy
photos/16/caption: Front porch view 2
photos/17/caption: Located on trail 31 of the Devil Anse trail system.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: The entire house and yard are accessible to guests.
sectionedDescription/description:
My place is good for couples, families (with kids), and big groups.

Close enough to town (1.2 miles) that you can ride your ATV to the Hatfield McCoy trail, restaurants, grocery stores and gas stations yet far enough away that you don't hear the train come through town. The Devil Anse trail head is the closest trail, however it connects to the Buffalo Mountain and Rock House trail that you can ride all the way to the town of Gilbert. The 1 acre flat elevated lot provides privacy from neighbors and enough parking for all your trucks, trailers and ATV's. A power washer is provided to wash your ATV for no charge.

The entire house and yard are accessible to guests.

You can reach me anytime during your stay if you need anything.

Located in historic Matewan with direct access to trail 31 of the Devil Anse trail system there's no shortage of things to do. Whether riding your ATV on the famous trail system or visiting the historic sites of the Hatfield McCoy feud our town offers something for everyone.

Matewan is an ATV friendly town so you can ride into town or directly to the trail head. Our lot offers an acre of flat, private and secure parking.

Our family has been in this holler for over 40 years so we can direct you to the best attractions, restaurants and entertainment in the area. For your safety the property is under video surveillance.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Taxes included in nightly charge
- Please place all used linens in the laundry room before leaving
- Please respect the neighbors
- Driving thru the yard will result in a $250 charge
- Please bag all trash and place it in the garbage cans on the back porch before 
   leaving
- Check in time is 4pm
- Checkout time is 11am

sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: Located in historic Matewan with direct access to trail 31 of the Devil Anse trail system there's no shortage of things to do. Whether riding your ATV on the famous trail system or visiting the historic sites of the Hatfield McCoy feud our town offers something for everyone.
sectionedDescription/notes: Our family has been in this holler for over 40 years so we can direct you to the best attractions, restaurants and entertainment in the area. For your safety the property is under video surveillance.
sectionedDescription/space: Close enough to town (1.2 miles) that you can ride your ATV to the Hatfield McCoy trail, restaurants, grocery stores and gas stations yet far enough away that you don't hear the train come through town. The Devil Anse trail head is the closest trail, however it connects to the Buffalo Mountain and Rock House trail that you can ride all the way to the town of Gilbert. The 1 acre flat elevated lot provides privacy from neighbors and enough parking for all your trucks, trailers and ATV's. A power washer is provided to wash your ATV for no charge.
sectionedDescription/summary: My place is good for couples, families (with kids), and big groups.
sectionedDescription/transit: Matewan is an ATV friendly town so you can ride into town or directly to the trail head. Our lot offers an acre of flat, private and secure parking.

additionalHouseRules:
All reservations are considered confirmed at the time of booking. Please note that the  terms of this Rental Agreement are non-negotiable. This Rental Agreement MUST be agreed upon at time of booking. 
 1. RENTAL. The rental rate for the Rental Property is based on a party of four (4) persons. Guest acknowledges that additional persons are permitted provided the number of persons does not exceed the maximum occupancy for the Rental Property. Guest further understands that for each additional person, a fee of $10.00 shall be added to the nightly rental rate provided each additional guest is registered prior to check-in as set forth herein. 

2. CHECK-IN/CHECK-OUT TIMES. Guest may check-in at any time after 3:00 p.m. on Guest's Arrival Date, and the Guest shall check-out no later than 10:00 a.m. on the Guest's Departure Date. A minimum fee of $25.00 per hour may be charged to the renter’s card for checkout after 10:00 AM unless previous arrangements have been made through this office.

3. REFUNDS. Guest hereby agrees and acknowledges that Guest shall not be entitled to a refund in the event Guest departs before the end of the Reservation or in the event Guest arrives late or does not arrive for the Reservation. Guest further hereby agrees and acknowledges that there will be no refund nor relocation in the event Guest is disappointed with the Rental Property. Furthermore, there shall be no refund or compensation for the occurrence of any and all events out of the control of DAISY'S CABINS, including but not limited to, weather conditions, power outages, water outages, mechanical failure of appliances and electronics, and/or central heat and air. Furthermore, Guest shall not be entitled to a refund in the event Guest is required to vacate the Rental Property due to a violation of local, state or federal law or the policies of DAISY'S CABINS. Refunds will only be issued at the discretion of DAISY'S CABINS.

4. DAMAGES. Guest shall be solely responsible for any property damage, accident or injury to any person or loss sustained by any person, including loss of money, jewelry and other items of personal property, arising out of or in any way related to Guest's use of the Rental Property or the items of personal property provided by DAISY'S CABINS and/or the owner of the Rental Property. Guest shall inspect and be familiar with proper use and application of such items prior to using them. Guest hereby agrees to indemnify and hold DAISY'S CABINS and/or the owner of the Rental Property harmless from any and all claims including those of third parties, arising out of, or in any way related to Guest's use of the Rental Property or the items of personal property provided therein. 

5. AGENCY DISCLOSURE.  DAISY'S CABINS serves as the agent of the owner of the Rental Property. DAISY'S CABINS shall represent and act at all times in the best interests of the owner of the Rental Property. Furthermore, DAISY'S CABINS reserves the right for random inspections to insure that all policies and procedures are followed. All information provided by DAISY'S CABINS regarding the Rental Property has been provided by the owner of the Rental Property and is believed to be accurate, but cannot be guaranteed. Guest acknowledges that the owner of the Rental Property may remove the Rental Property from the rental program with DAISY'S CABINS. Guest further understands that availability of the Rental Property cannot be guaranteed, and DAISY'S CABINS may find it necessary to move Guest to a comparable rental property.

6. VISITORS. A Visitor of the Guest(s) may occupy the property on a temporary basis only. Visitors may not occupy the property beyond 10:00 pm or stay overnight without being registered with DAISY'S CABINS. Each rental property has a maximum occupancy and at NO time should said property be occupied by more than allowed number of guest stated. No house parties, weddings or other events are allowed. Should evidence of misuse or violation of occupancy be discovered at any time, the Guest(s) of record will be charged accordingly or immediately evicted without refund. 
 
7. USE OF RENTAL PROPERTY. Guest shall occupy and use the Rental Property in a manner that shall not disturb or offend neighbors of the Rental Property. The use of fireworks is strictly prohibited, and any violators of this provision shall be asked to vacate the Rental Property immediately.  Camp fires are permitted only in the designated fire pit and may only be used after 4 pm.  Camp fire must be attended at all times.

8. PETS.  Pets are NOT allowed in the rental property.  If evidence of a pet is found in the rental property, such as, but not limited to, feces/urine or fleas, a minimum of $50, together with the costs and expenses of additional cleaning services necessary to remove odors and/or stains shall be charged to the renter’s card. 

9. TELEVISIONS. A television equipped with Roku has been provided at DAISY'S CABINS.  There will be no option of ordering pay- per-view movies and/or events. In the event Guest orders a pay-per-view movie and/or event, Guest shall be assessed for the cost of the movie(s) and/or event(s), together with a service charge of $10.00. Satellite signal and reception and cable reception is not always reliable, especially during extreme weather, and cannot be guaranteed. 

10. INTERNET. Internet service is provided at all rental properties; however, the speed of the service is not guaranteed. The password for said service will be given to you at time of check-in or by calling the office. Please note that all internet services are not secured. Should guest be found illegally using, downloading, copying, and/or distributing copyrighted material over the network then guest shall be subject to any and all actions imposed by service provider for copyright infringement cost. 

11. FURNITURE. Please do not move any of the cabin furniture (including outdoor furniture) as this may scratch the floor causing damages. If the furniture or floors are damaged during your stay you will be held responsible and charged accordingly. 

12. HEATING AND AIR.  DAISY'S CABINS contains electric heat which is controlled by a thermostat in the winter months.  Central air and /or window unit air conditioners will be provided in the property during the summer months.

13. LOST AND FOUND. KNOTTY POPLAR CABIN RENTALS shall not be responsible for any personal belongings that are lost, stolen, or left behind by Guest or any member of Guest's party. Any personal items found in or around the Rental Property shall be held for thirty (30) days. After the thirty (30) days, any unclaimed items will be discarded or donated unless the owner of the item contacts DAISY'S CABINS and claims the item. The item will be returned to said individual at his/her expense. DAISY'S CABINS will not be responsible for any lost items or damage to the items during shipping.

14. REPAIRS. Guest hereby agrees that DAISY'S CABINS or its agents may enter the Rental Property for the purpose of making necessary repairs and/or maintenance in and around the Rental Property. Furthermore, DAISY'S CABINS does not guarantee against mechanical failures that may occur in the heating, air conditioning, television, satellite receivers, cable box, or any other appliances. In the event an appliance or system is inoperative, Guest shall contact DAISY'S CABINS immediately. DAISY'S CABINS shall make every effort to have the repairs done quickly and efficiently, or DAISY'S CABINS shall move Guest to a different rental property, if possible. Guest(s) who have an after-hours emergency at the number which will be provided to you. All non-emergency issues should be reported to DAISY'S CABINS, at the number which will be provided you, during regular business hours. For any medical related emergency, call 911.

15. AGE REQUIREMENT. Guest is at least eighteen (18) years of age and acknowledges that he/she may be asked to provide proof of age at the time the Reservation is made. Guest is responsible for all other guests and visitors of the Rental Property during the Reservation. If Guest is not eighteen (18) years or older, DAISY'S CABINS reserves the right to terminate the Reservation without a refund. 

16. GARBAGE REMOVAL. All garbage must be bagged and removed from inside of the Rental Property. Bagged garbage may be placed in the outside garbage cans and will be picked up every other day of Guest's stay by an employee of DAISY'S CABINS.  Guest acknowledges that leaving garbage outside the designated container(s) may attract unwanted animals. 

17. SMOKING/NON-SMOKING. All properties are non-smoking. Smoking outside is allowed unless otherwise stated. Please be neat in disposing of cigarette butts, do not discard them around the property, driveway or yard. In the event smoking occurs inside the cabin, you shall be assessed a minimum charge of $250.00. 

18. CRITTERS & WILDLIFE. Please remember you are in the mountains. Each unit is professionally treated for pest control on a regular basis. Occasionally a few critters could make their way inside. In these rare instances, no refund will be given. In such a case, notify the office and we will make every effort to solve the problem in a timely manner. Please do your part by keeping windows and doors closed and all food and trash inside or in the appropriate outside receptacles.

19. ACKNOWLEDGEMENT OF RISKS. The undersigned Guest further understands and acknowledges that there are certain risks of physical injury, property damage, and inherent potential dangers of the activities conducted within (or upon) the DAISY'S CABINS. The undersigned Guest further understands and acknowledges the risks and dangers associated with his/her use of the DAISY'S CABINS premises, facilities, and equipment, and that such use has inherent dangers of personal injury and property damage. The undersigned Guest further accepts sole responsibility for risks and dangers which include, without limitation, the potential for serious bodily injury, permanent disability, paralysis and loss of life, disfigurement, loss of or damage to equipment/property, exposure to extreme conditions, harmful physical conflicts with other guests, animal attack, snake bites, insect bites/stings, allergic reactions, lightning strikes, dangers arising from adverse weather conditions, falling, fires and burns, dangerous road or trail conditions, water hazards, land hazards, equipment failure, defective equipment, inadequate safety measures, criminal activity of other guests, poor lighting, and other undefined not readily foreseeable and presently unknown risks and dangers (“Risks”). Guest expressly assumes the Risks of any and all damage and injury of any kind or type which may result from any source whatsoever during his/her time on the premises of DAISY'S CABINS.

By booking this property, Guest is acknowledging that he/she has read, fully understands, and agrees to all the above.

sectionedDescription/access: Guests will have the entire house to themselves.
sectionedDescription/description:
Hoot Owl Hideaway is situated in scenic Southwest Virginia. It is ideal for ATV enthusiasts looking for a nightly or weekly cabin rental.  You will be able to access Spearhead's Coal Canyon trail at the end of the driveway!  It's the perfect place to return after an adventure filled day of trail-riding.  A newly stocked catfish pond is also located on the property, so don’t forget your fishing poles!

Hoot Owl Hideaway offers 2 bedrooms and 1 bath and has all the essentials for your stay. WIFI is available and the TV is equipped with ROKU.  You will enjoy your own space with plenty of parking for your ATV trailers.  The kitchen is fully equipped with a stove, refrigerator, cook ware, utensils, and both coffee maker and Keurig.  Bed linens and dish towels are provided, but please bring your own bath towels.

Guests will have the entire house to themselves.

Hoot Owl Hideaway is 1/2 mile from the Grundy town limits, where various restaurants, a gas station, Walmart, and movie theatre are all located.  Additionally, it is a short drive to Elkhorn City, KY, where the Pine Mountain trails are accessible.

You will be able to leave Hoot Owl Hideaway's driveway and access Spearhead's Coal Canyon trail.  You also have the convenience of ATV access to the Grundy town center(about a 5 minute ride), where various restaurants, a gas station, and Wal-Mart are located.  Hoot Owl Hideaway is also a short drive from Breaks Interstate Park, Haysi, VA, and Elkhorn City, KY.   The Breaks Interstate Park offers various walking/bike trails, a water park, horseback riding, and zip lining.  Kayak tours are available in the local area through Levisa Adventures.  Additionally, river tubing is available on the Russell Fork River in the town of Elkhorn City, KY.  Time-Out Pizza/arcade offers tube rentals and a shuttle service for this activity.  Haysi and Elkhorn City offer 16 miles of whitewater rafting ranging from Class II to Class V rapids.

sectionedDescription/description:
Hiking:  the house is 40 minutes from Elk Garden, trail-head for AT sections of Mt. Rodgers or Whitetop Mtn,;  20 Mins from Davis Valley Road parking area, the AT trail-head for Burkes Garden; 50 minutes from Old Orchard Shelter parking lot, trail head on the AT hiking north into Grayson Highlands.  And one hour from Grayson Highlands State Park.

Situated on the corner of a four way country road that divides our farm, our home sits in the middle of rolling hills with gorgeous views.

The house, fenced in back yard, our pond across the road.

Have any questions or any issues? Please message me through the Airbnb site!

Beautiful neighborhood with tons of space in between houses. Across from Iris's Place is our family farm. Acres of land with cattle surround the farm.

Drive.
Plenty of parking available at the house.

additionalHouseRules:
-Prior to 11:00 on the day of departure, the Tenant will clean up the surrounding property before checkout otherwise check-out cleaning charges to you will result.  
-ACCOMMODATIONS: Tenant is responsible for keeping the unit clean and safe during the entire tenancy. Tenant has an obligation to notify Owner immediately of any safety issues discovered. In addition, Tenant is responsible for any and all damages to the property from all guests and ensuring maximum occupancy is not exceeded during his tenancy. Due to health department regulations, occupancy in homes served by septic systems is limited to two persons per bedroom, unless otherwise stated. 
-This cabin is designated as smoke free and therefore no smoking is permitted inside the structure.  
-All cabins are equipped for normal housekeeping. Each unit includes an electric coffee pot and toaster as basic kitchen equipment; dishwasher, washer/dryer, central air/heat, and microwave. All beds will have linens and pillows provided.
-Mail, texts, and phone messages can be sent to 304-466-4444 or carolynpricestephens@gmail.com or 624 Tallery Mountain Road, Hinton, WV 25951.
-CHECK-OUTS: All cabins must be vacated by 11:00 on check-out day. We ask that this policy be recognized by all Tenants. An extra day’s rent will be charged for all late check-outs unless advance arrangements have been made for late check out (limited availability and subject to additional fee.  Lessee is responsible for washing dishes, bagging trash, emptying refrigerator, leaving the AC set on 78 degrees (or heat set on 55 degrees in the winter months), securing all doors and windows, and leaving the unit clean, damage-free and in good condition for the next renter. Any extra cleaning or excessive trash removal will be billed to Tenant at a minimum fee of $50.00. Please ensure you’ve packed all your belongings before checking out, as we cannot be responsible for items left. A $15.00 COD fee will apply for any items returned to you following your tenancy. Call our office for arrangements within 7 days after your departure, otherwise left items will be disposed. 
-We do not allow pets unless prior arrangements are made (registered service animals excepted). The Tenant will be responsible for cleaning after the animals inside and outside the cabin. 
-The Tenant, guests and all the occupants of the vacation home agrees to release and indemnify the Owner from and against all claims for damages and/or personal injuries to any person arising out of the use of subject premises, including interior and all exterior areas, including decks, stairs and other common areas that occurred during the tenancy of the premises.  Tenant agrees to be responsible for any repairs necessary due to their negligence.  

Let me know if you need anything.  


Carolyn 
304-466-4444

primaryHost/about: My husband is a retired German Language professor and I am still loving my work as a school psychologist.   We travel, read, and grow wonderful flowers in our little piece of the world.    When not on Tallery Mountain, we keep returning to Saint Malo, France.  We love the food, the sea and the history there almost as much as the food, the mountains and the history here.   We are West Virginians, born and raised.  Company is always welcome.
sectionedDescription/description:
On Tallery Mountain in Summers County, WV, it's almost Heaven to just sit on the back porch and watch the sunset.

In the heart of white water rafting, curvy motorcycle roads and golf courses, comfortable quarters are guaranteed after a hike or a day of fishing on the Bluestone or New Rivers.   Within 90 minutes is the Blue Ridge Parkway, New River Bridge, Pipestem, Bluestone, Babcock and Hawks Nest State Parks, The Greenbrier Resort, Tamarack, and historic Lewisburg.

name: Long Neck Lair Alpaca Farm
photos/1/caption: Enjoy the view from our patio.
sectionedDescription/access: Enjoy relaxing on our patio, or get to know our alpacas.
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy a relaxing stay on our alpaca farm, Long Neck Lair, overlooking the picturesque Appalachian Trail.  We offer a comfortable private room in our home for business travel or vacation/getaway travel.  We share opportunities for our guests to interact with and learn about our alpacas. Convenient location off of I 81 at exit 54 on Route 11 N between Marion, Virginia and Wytheville, Virginia.

First floor room in our home has a private entrance and private bathroom. In room amenities include comfortable queen sofa bed, television, mini refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, hair dryer.

Enjoy relaxing on our patio, or get to know our alpacas.

We are excited to share our farm with our guests! We are available to answer questions and share southern hospitality.

Long Neck Lair is in a rural setting, yet conveniently located to the towns of Marion, VA and Wytheville, VA. Marion is a ten minute drive away and is home to Hungry Mother State Park and Lincoln Theatre. Wytheville is a fifteen minute drive away and offers museums, entertainment, and history. Both towns have restaurants and shopping.  There are two restaurants within walking distance of our farm.

Our farm, Long Neck Lair, is located on Route 11 North approximately 1/2 mile off of I 81 at exit 54. Access to the Appalachian Trail is 3/10 of a mile from our farm.Please check the Mountain Lynx Transit website for information on limited transportation in our area.

Please contact us for same day availability.
Our farm is home to alpacas, chickens, dogs, and cats. Please take note, if you have allergies.
(Room rate includes 10.3% state and local taxes.)

additionalHouseRules:
Quiet time is between 10pm and 7am.
Cabin should be left in a clean manner. Excessively dirty cabins will be subject to additional cleaning fee. 
Please unload and park all atv's on the gravel at all times.
Absolutely no smoking inside cabins. If smoking is suspected you will be subject to a $150 fee to cover cleaning and deodorizing of cabin.
No grilling or cooking of any kind allowed on porches.
No illegal drugs of any kind allowed on property at any time.  allowed
Pets must be registered guests and under 30 lbs. Pets must be on leash at all  times outside. They must go with you on the trails or be crated in the cabin. Guests who leave dogs who bark constantly may be asked to leave with no refund.
Children must remain under adult supervision at all times.
Please place garbage in dumpster and wash your dishes before you leave. Also, please strip your beds linens and place in a pile somewhere in the cabin. Please place all used towels in a pile.
Cancellation Policy: We have a 30 day cancellation policy per cabin. If reservations are cancelled at least 30 days prior to your reservation date then a full refund will be given. If less than 30 days, then there will be no refund of your deposit unless we are able to rent the cabin(s) by the dates you originally reserved.  All cancellations will be charged $50 per cabin regardless of notification date. There will be no refunds for early departure.  If you have any further questions the just let us know.

primaryHost/about: We have been in the cabin rental business on the Hatfield McCoy Trails since October of 2007. Our guests are always satisfied and are usually return visitors.

sectionedDescription/description:
Wildwood Cabins sits right on the Guyandotte River and the views are amazing and peaceful. We are only 250 yards from trail 17 of the RockhousTrail and only five minutes from the grocery store, restaurants, and gas stations in downtown Gilbert. We can leave trail permits and maps in the cabin for you so there's no need to worry about running those down. Our cabins are very well kept and clean.

We live on property and are available if you need us.

primaryHost/about:
I’m a floral designer and own my own shop “Flowers on Olde Main” in St.Albans WV managed by my daughters. I’m semi retired. 
I love people and love to travel. My family has owned Laurel Creek Farm since 1955 and  I acquired Laurel Creek Cottage in  2004.they are  located just across the street from each other.
Laurel Creek Farms Studio is a Mother- in Law type studio inside Laurel Creek Farm but completely separated by a large breezeway and has a separate private entrance .All properties can be rented together or separately. The properties are ideal for family reunions and family trips.
sectionedDescription/access: The entire 17 acres of land can be used for hiking.
sectionedDescription/description:
Located just 5 minutes from Pipestem State Park and Concord University.
Decor is French Country.  There is a sunken living room with a stone fireplace…. The rest of the home is all on one level. Elegant furnishings and elements  abound. Wooden and tile floors. Come and make wonderful memories with family and friends. 5 minutes from Pipestem Park and resort. Nearby Spa For couples massage , manicure , pedicures.

The entire house except the garage separated from the main house by a breezeway.

The entire 17 acres of land can be used for hiking.

I may be off site.

Pipestem State Park is 5 minutes away as well as Concord University. Camp Creek State Park, Brush Creek State Park and Bluestone State Park are all with in a half hour. Winter Place Ski Resort is about 35 minutes from here. There is a working Drive-in-Theatre at the end of our road less than 1 mile away.
This is a very private area and there are only 10 families on our dead end road. Not a lot of traffic.
Close to several nice restaurants ...(near Pipestem )minutes away and a very unique gift shop/cafe that serves  breakfast and lunch 
only 1 mile away.
Lewisburg and White Sulfur Springs ( The Greenbrier) is a little more than an hour away.

By car as we are in a rural area but very near fine restaurants, deli’s & gas stations. Pizza delivery is available from Gino’s in Athens 5 minutes away.

This is a very unique house. The large front porch has party lights and ceiling fans. There is a fire pit and a gas grill on site as well.
Tiki lights for a great atmosphere.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
The five acre yard would be wonderful for an outdoor wedding. This property would great for a bridal party to stay in for other area wedding venues. There is an adjacent cottage that could be rented also that sleeps 5....
No bachelor parties or bachelorette parties however.

additionalHouseRules:
•	No smoking allowed in rooms, hallways, or patios. There will be an additional $100 smoke cleaning charge added to your bill, in the event smoking has taken place on the property.
•	Additional cleaning charges apply for excessive cleaning due to mud or garbage left by guest upon departure. 
•	NO excessive noise allowed at any time. 
•	DO NOT litter on premise.
•	Please reset thermostat upon departure; 72 degrees in the summer and 68 degrees in the winter.
•	Linens, towels, and toiletries will not be changed during your stay. There is a laundry mat located at The Heritage Apartments-3690 Coal Heritage Rd.
•	Destruction, theft, or damage of property will result in legal action and payment will be due immediately.
•	If Wi-Fi goes out please contact (304)-589-5789
•	Guests are responsible for personal property.
•	Only permitted guests allowed on property.
•	Check out is at 11:00 A.M. Please request for late checkout availability *additional charges will apply*.
•	Permitted pets only with $100 nonrefundable pet fee. If your pet causes destruction to property, this will incur additional fees and/or legal action.
•	Trash dumpster is located outside, remove all trash upon departure and place in dumpster on property.
•	Wash all used dishes, dry, and put away prior to departure.
•	Strip all used bed linens, towels, etc. and place in tub for cleaners. 
•	Be mindful of neighbors as some do live here year-round.
•	Management office is open Monday-Friday 9:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m. for any major questions or concerns. 
-$100 cleaning fee per stay.
-Weekly & Monthly stays available. 
-2 night minimum required.
