name: Spurrier Unit 1 (2 Bedroom 1 Bath Pets Allowed)
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
This beautifully updated 2 full-bed 1-bath apartment features a complete kitchen with all the necessities, free Wi-Fi, and a smart TV in the living room and both of the bedrooms, with a DVD player included at each. Walking distance to shopping & restaurants. Includes two queen bed, towels & washcloths for 4 guests, and a charcoal grill on the covered balcony. Central heat & air. Pets allowed with additional per-pet fee. You will be just a short ride to all the Hatfield/McCoy trail systems.

***FULLY FURNISHED EXECUTIVE RENTAL***

ALL UTILITIES AND WI-FI INCLUDED!

2 Bedroom Apartment *Bluewell Area*

GPS Address: 219 Spurrier Rd., Bluefield, WV 24701

Everything you need in one place!
Are you looking for a nightly rental that’s just as comfortable as your own home?
If so, you have found the right place!

Spurrier Apt. 1
This rental has a full bed in both of the two bedrooms. Towels and washcloths are included for four guests.

It was just remodeled with brand new paint throughout, a new central heating and air HVAC unit, new bedding, new flooring, and leather dual-reclining sofa in the living room. This rental includes a complete kitchen with all of the necessities, from pots and pans down to silverware, and a full-size stove & refrigerator, and charcoal grill for your use on your private, covered, back patio! We have supplied everything down to the hangers to hang your clothes on inside of full-sized closets with dressers in both bedrooms. There is a smart TV in the living room and both of the bedrooms, with a DVD player included at each to watch your favorite Red Box movies on.

It is within walking distance to shopping and restaurants such as Dollar General, Gino’s Pizza, to a local favorite ‘Lynn’s Drive-In Restaurant’, a gas station, Advanced Auto, and even a laundromat. Razor and ATV riding is legal on all streets in this town. You can park your truck and trailer in the parking lot and ride straight to the trails. Great cell service, FREE WIFI, and it is only a short ride to all of the trail systems.

Side Note: You will have to go up steps to get to this two-bedroom apartment style nightly rental.

Contactless check-in and check-out is a must. You are emailed your door code and once inside you have an extra security door lock.
• 3:00PM check-in / 11:00AM check-out

Units are only available for out-of-town guests or corporate and business professionals looking for a temporary place to stay in the area.

Contactless check in and check out is a must. You are emailed your door code the day of check in and once inside you have an extra security door lock.

	3PM check-in & 11AM check-out. Early check-in and late check-out may
        be available for an additional fee.
	2-night minimum stay required which will include all of the luxuries you have in your own home.
	PETS WELCOMED! $100 non-refundable pet fee will be required though due to the extensive deep cleaning conducted after a pet has visited.

primaryHost/about: Happily married. Love the outdoors and traveling, renovation and design, woodworking and gardening.
sectionedDescription/access: Entire home, large secured garage for ATVs and SxSs, and patio deck in back. Exterior parking for tow vehicle and trailer.
sectionedDescription/description:
Close to trailheads, to the welcome center,  to restaurants, grocery stores, car wash, ATV parts store and pharmacies. Two queen beds with top of the line mattresses.  1.5 bathrooms, heated toilet seat, kitchen, living room, a mudroom a private outdoor patio with grill. Elaborate coffee station, Wi-Fi, Roku TV, charging stations, and large, secure garage for your machines. Outdoor security cameras for your and your vehicle's protection. Park your tow vehicle and ride your whole stay!

ATV's Welcome throughout our small town. You can ride from Adventurer's Rest to the trails, restaurants, the car wash, and the grocery store. Every room you walk into provides a new experience. Rest after the adventures of the day. Relax and enjoy the stay as much as the you enjoy the adventure itself.

High end finishes, bluetooth speaker light fixture, Roku TV, multiple charging stations, heated toilet seat with LED lighting, lighted bathroom mirror, Induction cooktop, Rainfall/waterfall/body jet shower, heat lamps provide a spa-like/never cold shower experience. Exquisite flooring, Homedics soundspa for a peaceful sleep experience. Luxury towels and linens. Keurig Coffee maker with a varied selection of coffee and teas. Helpful and attentive hosts that are available during your stay. Our goal is that you enjoy your stay and will want to return again and again!

Entire home, large secured garage for ATVs and SxSs, and patio deck in back. Exterior parking for tow vehicle and trailer.

We live in the other home on the property and will give you as much privacy as you desire. We will be available by text for the duration of your stay should you need anything.

Quiet neighborhood, close to trailheads, restaurants, grocery stores, drug stores and more. ATVs and SxSs are welcome on our public streets with a helmet and insurance. In addition to the famous Hatfield/McCoy trail system and the Spearhead trails, we also have Exhibition Coal Mines, Wintergreen Ski Resort, Pinnacle Rock State and Pipestem State Parks and plenty of hiking and gorgeous mountain views nearby.

You can park your tow vehicle and ride the whole time you are here if you so desire.

Adventurer's Rest is not just a place to lay your head. Each room is an experience. Bedroom 1 has a ceiling light which is also a bluetooth speaker that can be controlled to change colors or show scenes, and can even be used as an alarm. 

Bedroom 2 has a sleepspa machine with your choice of noises to sleep to. 

The full bath has a heated toilet seat with a built in nightlight and a lighted mirror. It also has a rain shower with waterfall and body spray options. 

We offer a Roku TV with plenty of streaming capabilities.

And the design of every room with high end finishes is an experience in itself.

additionalHouseRules:
-Check-in: after 3:00 pm, Self check-in with keypad or Lockbox. Guest will be sent detailed check-in instructions 1 day prior arrival date on airbnb inbox. Access code will be provided for self-check in.
-Check-out: 10:00 am,  avoid extra day charge. 
-Before rental you need to submit the names of all occupants. 
-No subletting is allowed.   
-There shall NOT be smoking, vaping, e-cigarettes allowed inside the apartment. Extra cleaning fees ($1,000.00 dollars) minimum charge to remove odor and stains, eviction from Rental Unit.
-Pets are NOT allow in this property. Unauthorized Pets $500.00 dollars, plus any damages and additional cleaning cost incurred, eviction for rental unit without refund.
-Guest(s) are only allowed to be accompanied by members of the party, no additional visitor who is not member of the party or in the list.
-Damaged or Missing items varies depending on cost of items.
-Complaints, or potential warning issues, if necessary, eviction, without refund and a charge of up to $500.00 dollars.
-NO opening any of the windows.
-NO PARTIES or EVENTS
-PLEASE WASH YOUR DISHES after used; sink, dish-washing machine and soap are available.
-Excessive cleaning Up to $150.00 per hour of additional cleaning needed
-Prefer NO shoes in the apartment
-NO candles.
-Do not alter or tamper with security system, if you do, your stay will be immediately terminated without refund.
-There is no video surveillance monitoring in the interior of the apartment.
-For all stays over 28 days, we require access to the unit for maintenance, you will be inform one day before maintenance occurs. 
-We can provide you with a pack n play or toddler bed if you ask for one before you stay.
-Illegal downloads are forbidden.

name: Recently Renovated Historic Apartment
sectionedDescription/description:
Spacious (1,100 square foot) and private (will not be share with host or other guests) accommodation on Historic Marion, the heart of the Wonderful Mountain Empire of Virginia.
This three-bedroom, two bath apartment was fully renovated in 2021 and features hardwood floors throughout, HVAC heating and cooling, WIFI and cable television.
Walk within a few minutes to the many uniques restaurants in downtown Marion, or prepare your own meals in the fully-equipped kitchen.

The apartment will NOT be share with host or other guests, we love for you to enjoy all the comfort and privacy it offers, will also available to assist you with any support or amenities that you might need. 
The entire apartment accommodated 6 guests, in  one queen bed, one full, and two extra-long twins beds.

Convenient to the Lincoln Theatre, Back of the Dragon, Hungry Mother State Park, and the Mt. Rogers National Recreation Area.Approximate 60 minutes from Bristol Motor Speedway. 
Park at the door and walk up 20 steps.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
-Check-in: after 3:00 pm, Self check-in with keypad or Lockbox. Guest will be sent detailed check-in instructions 1 day prior arrival date on airbnb inbox. Access code will be provided for self-check in.
-Check-out: 10:00 am,  avoid extra day charge. 
-Before rental you need to submit the names of all occupants. 
-No subletting is allowed.   
-There shall NOT be smoking, vaping, e-cigarettes allowed inside the apartment. Extra cleaning fees ($1,000.00 dollars) minimum charge to remove odor and stains, eviction from Rental Unit.
-Pets are NOT allow in this property. Unauthorized Pets $500.00 dollars, plus any damages and additional cleaning cost incurred, eviction for rental unit without refund.
-Guest(s) are only allowed to be accompanied by members of the party, no additional visitor who is not member of the party or in the list.
-Damaged or Missing items varies depending on cost of items.
-Complaints, or potential warning issues, if necessary, eviction, without refund and a charge of up to $500.00 dollars.
-NO opening any of the windows.
-NO PARTIES or EVENTS
-PLEASE WASH YOUR DISHES after used; sink, dish-washing machine and soap are available.
-Excessive cleaning Up to $150.00 per hour of additional cleaning needed
-Prefer NO shoes in the apartment
-NO candles.
-Do not alter or tamper with security system, if you do, your stay will be immediately terminated without refund.
-There is no video surveillance monitoring in the interior of the apartment.
-For all stays over 28 days, we require access to the unit for maintenance, you will be inform one day before maintenance occurs. 
-We can provide you with a pack n play or toddler bed if you ask for one before you stay.
-Illegal downloads are forbidden.
-Before checking out, take out any food and garbage, trash must be in a trash bag. You will find the garbage bins outside down the stairs.
Thank you!

name: Awesome Flat Top Farmhouse - Ashwood Rentals
p3SummaryAddress: Flat Top, West Virginia, United States
primaryHost/about: Professional who loves to travel!
sectionedDescription/description:
Ashwood Rentals

When I vacation in the mountains, I like to feel very comfortable ! From the minute that I arrive, I want to feel like I'm vacationing in my second home. I don't want to check-in at an office, and then go park my car far away from me. I want a place that has easy access to me unloading all of my luggage, groceries, skis, snowboard, and kids!

Linens are provided but please bring your own towels.

The house sleeps at least 15+ people. There is a bedroom on the main level with a queen bed. There is a sleeper sofa in the living room. The upstairs has two bedrooms.  One has a king bed and the other room has a queen bed and a full bed. In the finished basement there is currently two twin beds and two full beds. There is also some room in the basement for some air mattresses if needed.

Linens are provided but towels are not.

We highly recommend that you purchase travel insurance. Problems can arise in multiple ways and travel insurance can be a low cost guard against losing your money if you have last minute problems and have to cancel. In the past, some of our guests have obtained insurance by going to various insurance sites for details and to purchase. We did call the people at InsureMyTrip and they do have plans that will cover for Covid issues but there are several important steps and needs to be done shortly after making your first deposit. The plans are called "Cancel For Any Reason" CFAR. Check with your insurance agent before deciding what insurance to purchase. We DO NOT endorse any insurance in particular.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No pets.

In order to keep the house as allergen free as possible...guests found to bring pets will forfeit entire security deposit.

name: Rich Valley Retreat
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
50% off  monthly stays, 20% off weekly!  Relax in our farm front retreat!  Nestled in the Blue Ridge Highlands of the Appalachian Mountains this country cottage is centrally located to the best of Southwest Virginia.  Private, yet convenient.  About 15 minutes to Abingdon and Emory.  We are happy to share our farm with you and you are welcome to take a walk through the forest or look at some farm animals.  A truly unique location that inspires peace and tranquility.  The mountains are calling...

Come relax in our farm front retreat.  Nestled in the Blue Ridge Highlands of the Appalachian Mountains this country cottage is centrally located to the best of Southwest Virginia.  Private, yet only a 15 minute drive to Abingdon, Emory and Henry College, Meadowview, Glade Spring and Saltville.  About a 35 minute drive to Bristol, Marion and Damascus.  A great home base to take in a show at the Barter Theatre, explore the ice age finds of Saltville, hike the Great Channels, or see the wild ponies at Grayson Highlands just to name a few.  Savor the view of the blue mountains from your front porch!  Enjoy the beautiful hardwood floors throughout this home, with tile in the 2.5 bathrooms.  The three bedrooms have a total of five beds.  Free Wi-Fi is provided.  The lower level is an unfinished basement where you may store your bicycles, kayaks, etc.  Just outside you will find a fire pit with chairs.  You can either walk up the front porch steps or drive around back which takes you to the first level.  This level boasts a dining room, a fully stocked kitchen, a living room with leather couches and tv with Netflix, storage closets and a half bath with washer and dryer.  The master bedroom is on this level with a king sized bed, his and hers closets, and a full bathroom.  The second level has a small sitting area with divan and a full bathroom.  There are two bedrooms, each with a queen sized bed and also a full sized bed, with large closets.  While outside you may get a visit from Rocky, the farm dog, who loves people.  The driveway is gravel.  If you choose to leave the front porch (you may not) you are welcome to hike through the woods or contact us to see some farm animals.  For an additional fee, we will fulfill special requests, don’t hesitate to ask.  We are also happy to make recommendations.  Absolutely no smoking, no pets.  No hidden fees, a flat rate of $250 per night, plus county/state tax and airbnb fees.  The mountains are calling…

Our home is also on the farm, so we are readily available for your needs.

Our retreat is unique in that it is rural yet close to many areas of interest.  Take the Barter Theatre, for instance, which is the longest running professional theatre in the nation.  If you enjoy hiking, you could visit the Great Channels which is a sandstone maze formed 400 million years ago.  There is much more, we love to make recommendations so please don't hesitate to ask!

p3SummaryAddress: Mount Hope, West Virginia, United States
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience country charm with our quaint two-bedroom vacation rental. Along with a cozy living room and a handy kitchenette, enjoy high-speed internet, a smart tv and reliable AT&T cell service. Accessible by car and motorcycle, this rural haven perfectly balances tranquility with modern connectivity. A perfect countryside escape!

Full galley kitchen, drop-leaf table, couch and chair as well as two rockers on the porch.

Our caretaker, Richard, lives just across the way and can help take care of anything you might need.

Hike out the back door for miles up the mountain, or drive just 15 minutes north to the New River Gorge with hiking, climbing and rafting on tap anytime.

The cabin is only 8 miles from the center of Beckley, WV, with stores, restaurants, and a movie theater.

additionalHouseRules:
Not suitable for infants and young toddlers due to safety issues, example, the home has stairs and there are no baby gates or cribs yet.

We ask, before checking out please leave the house as you found it. Please clean up what you have used. Thank you for being our guest.

1. Clean out the refrigerator and microwave then put the dishes in the dishwasher and please start it. Wipe down anything in the kitchen that has been used. 

2.  Put dirty towels in the hamper in the washroom. 

3. Sweep if needed, And take out the garbage to trash cans outside. 

4. Do Not remove bed sheets or spread. The housekeeper will remove for laundry.
 
5. Turn off heat/ air conditioner and lights in each room. 
  
6. Text CHECKED OUT through Airbnb App

Thank you for coming!

primaryHost/about:
Hello, we are Debbie and Wayne Muncy and we’re  excited to have been hosting since 2020. Wayne is a minister and we have worked in ministry for years. Wayne also works full time as a custodian and I am a retired nurse.  We currently take care of my mother and another lady who has been a part of our family for 23 years. We have two grown children and two little grandsons. 
We live here locally and have all of our lives. Our goal for our guests is to have a pleasant and enjoyable visit while here in WV. Please feel free to contact us anytime during your stay. We’d be happy to assist you.
sectionedDescription/access:
There is PARKING in front of the house, back and side, as well as, in the back across the alley road directly behind the house. The whole area is graveled. When unloaded there’s room to park. If you have several trailering, there is EXTRA PARKING available at the school located 4 houses down at the back entrance. It is very easy to see, can’t miss it. 
The water hose is on the FRONT side of the house if you need to wash off your ride. You can pull up an park there or pull the hose around the front to the other side and back if you’d like.
The storage building in back yard is not accessible to guests, neither is the basement.
sectionedDescription/description:
Located approximately 8 minutes to the Hatfield McCoy Warrior Trail System. We are on Rt 16, part of the”Head of the Dragon” Motorcycle Riding Route in Caretta, WV.  You will have easy access to “The Warrior trail” at Caretta or at War. 
The house  sleeps 9 and there's space for addition air mattresses. We have gravel parking in the front, back and side of property. There is a HOT water on demand system, Cable TV, WiFi, kitchen, and washer/Dryer.

You can access the trail from Caretta or ride over to War which is a 6 min ride to Grants Supermarket🍎🍉🥦🥑and the local restaurants, The Owl,🌭🍟
The Holy Moly Cafe🍔🥗🍕🍽🥧 also 
Taco Todd’s 🌮and, A Scoop of Heaven 🍧🍦🧋
You can get gas ⛽️ at Hillbilly Market and purchase Trail permits. We also have Walgreens and a Dollar General. A two minute drive through town will take you to the Warrior Trailhead. You may travel anywhere on your ATV, or SxS.
Berwind Lake is about 4 miles from War. There’s fishing, Canoeing, picnics and a beautiful hiking trail to walk around the lake. The 💧lakes swimming pool 💧is open this season.
At  the upper end of the lake you can ride a dirt road across barewallow hollow which is a beautiful adventurous ride.

There is PARKING in front of the house, back and side, as well as, in the back across the alley road directly behind the house. The whole area is graveled. When unloaded there’s room to park. If you have several trailering, there is EXTRA PARKING available at the school located 4 houses down at the back entrance. It is very easy to see, can’t miss it. 
The water hose is on the FRONT side of the house if you need to wash off your ride. You can pull up an park there or pull the hose around the front to the other side and back if you’d like.
The storage building in back yard is not accessible to guests, neither is the basement.

We live locally and encourage you to contact us with any questions or assistance you may need. We would be glad to help with directions or points of interest. It is our goal to help your stay be enjoyable.

We are just a 6 minute ride to War, WV where we have Grants supermarket. There is a Walgreens, Dollar General, Hillbilly Market (where you can gas up your ATV). Restaurants are Holy Moly Cafe, The Owl, Taco Todd’s  and A scoop of Heaven across the street from the Dollar General. 
The Warrior Trail Head is in War, WV and the trail office to obtain trail passes. Berwind Lake is approximately 4 miles from War, WV  there is a pool at the lake. 
We are only a 20 min ride to Welch, WV from the house and Coalwood is 10 minutes, where there is a Country Corner Store on main road and gas available. At Coalwood you can take frog level road to the end and go to Wilmore dam

Welch has a Wendy’s, Goodsons Supermarket, McDonalds, Subway, KFC, PIzza Hut, Walgreens, and Welch Community Hospiital. A must try is the Sterling Drive In. You can find them online or look in our guidebook on  this listing. There is the Pocahontas Theater. In Welch, WV, and Linkous Park is in Welch.

Our county is ATV friendly. You are welcome to ride your ATV wherever you may want to go.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Not suitable for infants and young toddlers due to safety issues, example, the home has stairs and there are no baby gates or cribs yet.

We ask, before checking out please leave the house as you found it. Please clean up what you have used. Thank you for being our guest.

1. Clean out the refrigerator and microwave then put the dishes in the dishwasher and please start it. Wipe down anything in the kitchen that has been used. 

2.  Put dirty towels in the hamper in the washroom. 

3. Sweep if needed, And take out the garbage to trash cans outside. 

4. Do Not remove bed sheets or spread. The housekeeper will remove for laundry.
 
5. Turn off heat/ air conditioner and lights in each room. 
  
6. Text CHECKED OUT through Airbnb App

Thank you for coming!
sectionedDescription/interaction: We live locally and encourage you to contact us with any questions or assistance you may need. We would be glad to help with directions or points of interest. It is our goal to help your stay be enjoyable.
sectionedDescription/name: Warrior Trail Lodging: The Caretta Cottage
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie:
We are just a 6 minute ride to War, WV where we have Grants supermarket. There is a Walgreens, Dollar General, Hillbilly Market (where you can gas up your ATV). Restaurants are Holy Moly Cafe, The Owl, Taco Todd’s  and A scoop of Heaven across the street from the Dollar General. 
The Warrior Trail Head is in War, WV and the trail office to obtain trail passes. Berwind Lake is approximately 4 miles from War, WV  there is a pool at the lake. 
We are only a 20 min ride to Welch, WV from the house and Coalwood is 10 minutes, where there is a Country Corner Store on main road and gas available. At Coalwood you can take frog level road to the end and go to Wilmore dam

Welch has a Wendy’s, Goodsons Supermarket, McDonalds, Subway, KFC, PIzza Hut, Walgreens, and Welch Community Hospiital. A must try is the Sterling Drive In. You can find them online or look in our guidebook on  this listing. There is the Pocahontas Theater. In Welch, WV, and Linkous Park is in Welch.
sectionedDescription/space:
You can access the trail from Caretta or ride over to War which is a 6 min ride to Grants Supermarket🍎🍉🥦🥑and the local restaurants, The Owl,🌭🍟
The Holy Moly Cafe🍔🥗🍕🍽🥧 also 
Taco Todd’s 🌮and, A Scoop of Heaven 🍧🍦🧋
You can get gas ⛽️ at Hillbilly Market and purchase Trail permits. We also have Walgreens and a Dollar General. A two minute drive through town will take you to the Warrior Trailhead. You may travel anywhere on your ATV, or SxS.
Berwind Lake is about 4 miles from War. There’s fishing, Canoeing, picnics and a beautiful hiking trail to walk around the lake. The 💧lakes swimming pool 💧is open this season.
At  the upper end of the lake you can ride a dirt road across barewallow hollow which is a beautiful adventurous ride.
sectionedDescription/summary:
Located approximately 8 minutes to the Hatfield McCoy Warrior Trail System. We are on Rt 16, part of the”Head of the Dragon” Motorcycle Riding Route in Caretta, WV.  You will have easy access to “The Warrior trail” at Caretta or at War. 
The house  sleeps 9 and there's space for addition air mattresses. We have gravel parking in the front, back and side of property. There is a HOT water on demand system, Cable TV, WiFi, kitchen, and washer/Dryer.
sectionedDescription/transit: Our county is ATV friendly. You are welcome to ride your ATV wherever you may want to go.

sectionedDescription/access: Guest are able to access all areas of the property with the exception of the equipment garage at the end of the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Property  is a ranch style house with wood siding, nestled against a hillside with a private setting. This property offers a large yard with a in-ground pool as well as a large front porch. There are two patio areas in the back with a built in grill station and a fire-pit to enjoy on those cool evenings. The house boasts six bedrooms, open concept living room, kitchen, and dining room area with gas fireplace, and large family room.Please  enter the correct number of guest

You get the entire house during your stay in a private setting where deer are often seen grazing on the hill or even in the yard. Open concept kitchen, living and dining room so that all the guests can enjoy being together as well as a separate large family room. All bedrooms are private and decorated with the host's genealogy.

Guest are able to access all areas of the property with the exception of the equipment garage at the end of the property.

The host will be available most of the time if needed, but will respect the guest's privacy.

Hatfield/McCoy Trails. Easy ATV access to Devil Anse trail head on the Hatfield-McCoy trail system (approximately 2 miles), not required to trailer ATV to trail system, close to ATV and kayak rentals, close to Historic Matewan, home of the Matewan Massacre and Hatfield-McCoy Feud historical sites. Visitors also have access to a grocery store, gas station, Family Dollar, Dollar General, etc. within two miles. Local restaurants include a delicious Mexican restaurant and a pizza place.

Most areas are accessible by vehicle or ATV. Visitors can enjoy walking along the flood wall in Matewan or nearby Hatfield-McCoy park.

In the heart of the famous Hatfield/McCoy feud,Matewan Massacre and Hatfield/McCoy trail system! Ride directly to devil ance,Rock house,Buffalo mtn trails and also outlaw trails !

sectionedDescription/access: Guests have full access.
sectionedDescription/description:
Property includes Four Luxury Chalets, nestled together, on the property of Pipestem Spa and Event Center. Pipestem Resort State Park is directly across the street.  Luxury spa services and many chalet amenities are available (please book those online).  

Well behaved small pets allowed with prior approval. Pet fee is $35 fee Per Pet, Per Day, to be paid to host upon arrival. If host is not notified of animals being present, the guest may be asked to leave immediately.

Cozy, two story, three bedroom chalet, fully equipped kitchen, with all linens provided. Relaxing front porch with comfortable chairs, charcoal BBQ grill, fire pit, flat screen TV with premium channels and w/d.

Guests have full access.

Contactless check-in. Guest will be sent an email with personal door code and Wi-Fi access one day before arrival.  Guest may arrive at any time after 4 PM, and check out is 10 AM. 

Massage, facial, hair and nail appointments for spa services must be booked in advance!


Guests may order Fruit and Cheese Trays, Champagne in Chalet, Romantic Couple's Massage with Foaming Milk Bubble Bath, King and Queen Packages, or Surprise Birthday Package (cake and balloons) in advance by contacting the host directly.

name: Cabin 2 at Bramwell Adventures-2 Min to Trail!
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Bramwell Adventures (formerly Bramwell ATV Resort) offers a comfortable stay in Appalachian paradise. Our 6 riverfront, pet-friendly* rentals are a minute from the Hatfield-McCoy trails. If fishing's more your thing the Bluestone River is right out back. White-water rafting on the world-renowned Gauley or New River, zip-lining, hiking, biking or horseback riding at Pipestem Resort State Park...whatever fun mountain stuff you're into, you'll find it nearby. *See Pet Policy in House Rules.

Cabin 2 is a large single-room efficiency on the riverfront with a kitchenette, private bathroom and shower, 2 bunk beds, and 2 lofts with 2 twin beds in each for a maximum capacity of 8 guests. The kitchenette is equipped with a compact refrigerator, 2-eye hotplate, dishes, pots, pans, cooking and eating utensils, coffee pot and microwave oven.  Cabins 1 and 2 are connected by a lockout door and may be rented together for a party of 14. WiFi is included, as well as onsite parking for trailers, trucks, and ATVs at no additional cost to our guests.

Holiday weekends during high season (April-October) require a three-night minimum stay. Off-season dates (November-March) require a two-night minimum stay.  Pets require an additional cleaning fee and guests must agree to pet policy.  (See House Rules for details.)  If you're interested in kayaking the Bluestone River, please speak with owner to make arrangements.

LATE CHECK-OUT/OVERSTAY:

name: House on 100 Dillion St. Hatfield McCoy Trail
photos/15/caption: Worlds Longest ATV Train Trestle! You will ride this to the Rockhouse Trail System.
sectionedDescription/access: There is parking for 4 trucks and trailers (20') at the house. If trailer is larger than 20' parking is available on our property across street, under the bridge. You can also text John for more details.
sectionedDescription/description:
Located in the heart of the Hatfield McCoy Trail System

HMT Rentals has direct trail access, we are  located in downtown Man, WV, less than one mile  from the Rockhouse Trailhead of the Hatfield McCoy Trail System.

Check-In to our unit, drop your trailer, unload your machines and ride your ATV, UTV or Motorcycle directly to one of the local businesses in the Town of Man. Businesses include (Gas, Food, Bar and Grill, Sporting Goods!!)

There is parking for 4 trucks and trailers (20') at the house. If trailer is larger than 20' parking is available on our property across street, under the bridge. You can also text John for more details.

Ride your machine through town to access the Hatfield McCoy Trail. Access Rockhouse Trail, Devil Anse Trail and Buffalo Mountain Trail. Also, ride your machine into town to eat at one of our many restaurants.

sectionedDescription/access: Our guests may enjoy their suite, the patios, the kitchen and the upstairs full bathroom.
sectionedDescription/description:
A comfortable, large private suite in our home, that includes your own kitchenette, stocked with cold water and tea, private .5 bath in the suite and a private full bath on the second floor, HDTV and free WiFi. Located in a quiet neighborhood in Beckley, West Virginia. (50 min south of Charleston, WV, 4.5hrs from Washington DC, ). Snacks & coffee available.

 We look forward to seeing you!

There are two queen beds and couch in the room.

Our guests may enjoy their suite, the patios, the kitchen and the upstairs full bathroom.

I like to leave our guests to themselves to decompress from their journey and get some rest, but I will be around for any comments or to answer any questions you may have.

Someone is usually around the house, but if we are not home, then just text me.  -Sheila

Located in a quiet neighborhood in Beckley, West Virginia. (50 min south of Charleston, WV, 4.5hrs from Washington DC, ). Snacks & coffee available.

 We look forward to seeing you!

sectionedDescription/access: Enjoy two whole floors of great gathering place...
sectionedDescription/description:
To do our part during COVID 19: Parties and events are not allowed.
Why rent a house or cabin when you rent the whole mountain!
PIPESTEM PARK JUST ADDED A WORLD CLASS ZIP LINE PARK! 
Ultimate Outdoors-ATV'ing, Rafting, Zip Lining, Lakes, Rivers, Golfing, Horse Riding, Hunting... and more!
Close to Interstate 77 exit 14 only 7 minutes. You’ll love my place because of the views, the highest lodge in Mercer County WV. Great for couples, business travelers, families, and up to 14 adults.

Over4000 sq ft of mountaintop home with 2000 sq ft wrap-around deck, sliding doors in every room. 7-Bedrooms and you can roam the whole mountain!

Enjoy two whole floors of great gathering place...

7 minutes from Pipestem State Park, 20 minutes from Winter Place Ski Lodge, 20 minutes from Bluestone Lake, 15 minutes from the New River... an surrounded by awesome nature. Just 14 minutes from exit 9 on interstate 77 where all the major chains are available, Wal Mart, Out Back, Chili's, Applebees, Mc Donalds, Taco Bell and many more!

name: Indian Creek Retreat
primaryHost/about: I am a pharmacist from rural Appalachian Virginia. Married with 2 adult children with whom I enjoy traveling the world whenever possible.
sectionedDescription/access: The entire downstairs apartment with access to a shared laundry room.
sectionedDescription/description:
1 Bedroom apartment in Cedar Bluff Virginia town limits. Sleeps 2-4. Friendly community. Tranquil setting in a rural town with a creek flowing nearby. 5 minutes to Richlands, Virginia. 10 minutes from the local hospital, Clinch Valley Medical Center.  20 minutes to Tazewell Virginia. 15 minutes to the Dragon's Back. 75 minutes to Bristol Motor Speedway. Multiple 4-wheeler trails nearby. Local Trout streams 30 minutes in any direction. Washer/Dryer access. Free Coffee.  Free Wifi.  Free Parking.

Grocery stores and pharmacies are conveniently located only 6 minutes away. Only 1 mile from the Blue Tornadoes Football field. If you happen to be a football fan you can find the whole town at Richlands High School on Friday nights during the fall.

The entire downstairs apartment with access to a shared laundry room.

Available by phone. We live locally so are available in the event of an emergency.

Enjoy gorgeous foliage and a breathtaking view at Cedar Bluff Overlook. It is about a 30-minute hike on a marked trail. Enjoy scenic drives through the Clinch Mountains, East River Mountains, and the Appalachian Mountains all around the area.
The Cedar Bluff Heritage Festival occurs annually on the third Saturday of September. You will find antique dealers and food vendors among many other activities. The festival attracts thousands of visitors and hundreds of vendors each year.  OKTOBREWFEST is a festival that is held on beautiful historic Main St. Tazewell, VA the first Saturday of October and was created to promote the craft beer industry in southwest VA and the surrounding area. It is the Premier Craft Beer Festival of the Heart of Appalachia.  There are several local restaurants of note, Cuz’s restaurant has been named the best in off-the-beaten-track restaurant categories. Bearded Moose is a frequented local barbecue restaurant loved by locals, and you can enjoy a sweet treat at Sugarfoot Bakery only 6 minutes away. Painted Peak Brewing Company is approximately 25 minutes away from the apartment where you can sample local brews. Multiple hiking trails and 4 wheeler trails are options for your entertainment. Kayaking and canoeing are available at local lakes and rivers. Enjoy Crab Orchard Museum located about 15 minutes away to learn more about the history in our area.
The apartment is located approximately 30 min from the Appalachian College of Pharmacy and approximately 13 minutes from Southwest Community College. Raven Theater is a historic site located about 10 minutes away. Limited show-times and hours, but when they are open it is a special stop for soda fountain ice cream.  Broadway Cinemas is the local contemporary theater located about 6 minutes away.

The town of Cedar Bluff has sidewalks with lights and you can enjoy a leisurely afternoon stroll. 4 County Transit offers public transportation. Town route fare is 25¢ per boarding.
Work express fare is 50¢ per boarding.
College routes are public routes and open to anyone who wants to ride. Fare for public riders is $1.00 per boarding.
College route fare is FREE for college students and staff/faculty who present college ID, seniors at least 60 years old, and children 5 or younger who are accompanied by an adult.
At your request, the bus can stop at other locations that are along its route. This is a route deviation service. 
Please call at least 48 hours in advance with your requests. 
Check out their website for additional information.

sectionedDescription/description:
Relax with the whole family on this peaceful working farm. Enjoy the farm animals and running stream in the heart of the Appalachian Mountains. Tour  the Blue Ridge Parkway or Creeper Trail.   Historic Wythe County, Wohlfahrt Theatre, Abingdon, Barter Theatre, Big Walker Lookout  Shot Tower, Draper Mercantile and so much more. Get unplugged, no distracting internet. Fish in the pond or make smores at the firepit.  Experience the farm with optional homegrown meals/tours. A little piece of heaven.

Beautiful renovated old cottage.

Separate little driveway runs right up to the cottage.
Enjoy sitting out on the upstairs balcony.

Located in Wythe Country, Southwest Virginia. Quiet, peaceful neighborhood, yet close enough to stores, restaurants. Lots of sightseeing and places to tour.
Fish right here in the pond on our farm
Bike, hike or swim.

Easy to explore and travel around by car.
Lots of local hiking and biking trails.
Also rivers for canoeing, tubing, swimming, fishing, etc.

Beautiful views.

photos/34/caption: Because of the angle of the driveway this is how motorcycles should park. There are orange kickstand pads hanging on the balcony for use.
primaryHost/about: I am a motor head for as long as I can remember and enjoy spending time in Tazewell so much I decided to build my own AirBnB and share my passion with others.
sectionedDescription/access:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY

Complete your Back of the Dragon experience with a Vanderhall Venice GT. This  ultra rare roadster will let you experience the open road like never before. Receive an extra 25% discount when staying at The Dragon's Den!

The driveway is at an angle. Please review the pictures to see best way to park your motorcycles. if you are coming in with a truck/trailer it is best to unload towards the top of the driveway. once you have unloaded park the truck/trailer at the top of the driveway in the grass leaving plenty of room for bikes to get in and out.

MOTORCYCLES BEWARE
PARKING: The easiest way to park is to come in towards the bottom/street side, turn towards the hill, then back your motorcycle towards the street and make sure to leave it in gear.

LEAVING: Make sure to go slow enough that you can stop at the bottom of the driveway. Due to the hills and landscape you cannot see oncoming traffic and cars drive a little fast on Dogwood.


Guests have access to the entire house including fully furnished kitchen, living room with sleeper sofa, dining room with a large dining table and outdoor spaces with comfortable seating.  Each room has a queen bed, 40" HD Smart TV, towels and soaps/laundry supplies.
sectionedDescription/description:
Minutes from downtown shopping and dining and easy access to the infamous Back of the Dragon.  Only one hour drive to Winterplace Ski Resort, WV.  High speed wireless internet throughout the entire property.    40" HD Smart TV in every room. Enjoy staying in a c. 1900 home that has been recently refurbished with the modern touches people are looking for.  Enjoy this fully furnished home away from home and travel safe with your loved ones.  Rent the entire house or individual rooms.

Enjoy The Back of the Dragon in a whole new way with the Vanderhall Venice GT!  An open air roadster experience like no other available from The Dragon's Den! Available on Riders Share.

Fully furnished 5 bedroom/2 bathroom in the heart of Tazewell, VA.  Each room has it's own smart lock, queen bed and a smart TV for access to your favorite streaming service.  A dresser with mirror is also in each room. WiFi is available throughout the house inside and out.  The sofa is a sleeper sofa available to whole house rentals only. Full size washer and dryer also included at no additional cost.  Enjoy the views while admiring the deer that can be found wandering around the property most mornings and evenings.

PLEASE READ CAREFULLY

Complete your Back of the Dragon experience with a Vanderhall Venice GT. This  ultra rare roadster will let you experience the open road like never before. Receive an extra 25% discount when staying at The Dragon's Den!

The driveway is at an angle. Please review the pictures to see best way to park your motorcycles. if you are coming in with a truck/trailer it is best to unload towards the top of the driveway. once you have unloaded park the truck/trailer at the top of the driveway in the grass leaving plenty of room for bikes to get in and out.

MOTORCYCLES BEWARE
PARKING: The easiest way to park is to come in towards the bottom/street side, turn towards the hill, then back your motorcycle towards the street and make sure to leave it in gear.

LEAVING: Make sure to go slow enough that you can stop at the bottom of the driveway. Due to the hills and landscape you cannot see oncoming traffic and cars drive a little fast on Dogwood.


Guests have access to the entire house including fully furnished kitchen, living room with sleeper sofa, dining room with a large dining table and outdoor spaces with comfortable seating.  Each room has a queen bed, 40" HD Smart TV, towels and soaps/laundry supplies.

I am a phone call away and want to help make sure your stay is as relaxing as possible.  Please do not hesitate to call or text throughout your stay for advice and what to see and where to eat. Once you book you will receive a message within one hour with my contact information.

Come explore historic downtown Tazewell, VA and everything it has to offer.  Tazewell Main Street has become one of the only 30 designated main streets in VA! Less than one mile to shopping, breweries and restaurants. Tazewell is a beautiful place to relax and call home for the weekend.

Tazewell, VA and the Back of the Dragon is the first and only designated motorcycle route in the state of Virginia.  Come enjoy this beautiful 33 mile road that takes your through three mountain passes from Tazewell to Marion, VA.

Tazewell does not have Uber/Lyft. if you need a taxi 2 brothers is usually 30 minutes away.

While we do have cameras monitoring the driveway and front porch to keep you and your bikes/cars safe from roaming dragons, unlike most other area rentals there are NO RECORDING DEVICES inside the house.

additionalHouseRules: I ask guests to avoid any scented (fragranced)  body lotions,  colognes, shampoos etc  in the house. Other guests may also be staying here who have allergies and sensitivities. And for housekeeping, it can take multiple washings to remove some scents.  I do offer fragrance-free shampoo, conditioner, lotion, soap, or  laundry soap as amenities that you are welcome to use! primaryHost/about:
Part of what made us want to be an Airbnb hosts is the wonderful hospitality we've known in our own travels.  As native Appalachians, my husband and I have a deep love for this region and its people and the tradition of hospitality.  We are both artists of sorts--I'm a freelance writer/reporter and he is a rock 'n roll keyboard player and works in the local school system. And we manage a herd of dairy goats, mostly LaMancha breed. All with names and personalities. Our place is about 15-20  minutes off off I-77. We're close to the notable "Back of the Dragon" motorcycle routes. And very close to some beautiful backroad bicycle routes. The scenery is beautiful all seasons of the year but especially the fall. We hope you'll visit!

 As for the goats, they are "the greatest entertainers and the greatest time wasters" as my dad used to say. He was a vet and built the house as a home and office. So it has a sort of historic/museum feel in certain sections. 

We don't guarantee food as part of our Airbnb listing,  but I love to cook and if I'm cooking, you're welcome to join us if you don't have other plans. 

Last but not least, we  love to know a little about our guests beforehand so PLEASE make sure you fill out the "Describe Yourself" questions under the Airbnb profile section to speed along the booking process.

Safe travels!
sectionedDescription/access: Spaces that guests share with host: the piano/parlor room -- a great place to sit down and read books by local authors, play the upright grand piano or access wi-fi.  The kitchen and dining area are available too, as shared space. The back porch is yours to enjoy, and it's right next to the goats. (Let me know ahead of time if you're interested in any hikes on the premises and if the weather is right, someone will try to be available to show you some beautiful views.)
sectionedDescription/description:
This is the best sleeping room in the house. Hot water radiator heat keeps the room warm in the winter and concrete floors keep it comfortably cool in the summer. There's access to a full bath with tub and shower but you must walk up a flight of stairs. I also try to keep the house as free from allergens/fragrances as possible for guests who have sensitivities (noted in House Rules below).

The wi-fi is very poor in the bedroom but great in the parlor room just down the hall.

Spaces that guests share with host: the piano/parlor room -- a great place to sit down and read books by local authors, play the upright grand piano or access wi-fi.  The kitchen and dining area are available too, as shared space. The back porch is yours to enjoy, and it's right next to the goats. (Let me know ahead of time if you're interested in any hikes on the premises and if the weather is right, someone will try to be available to show you some beautiful views.)

I'm in and out of the spaces with shared access but your bed and bath are always private. I like to socialize and interact with guests but I'm also happy to leave you to your own privacy.

There's a great little biking road about 1/4 mile from my home that lots of bikers love to ride. About 5 miles away is a great mountain bike trail at the Blfd WV city park. For more serious bikers, there's the Burkes Garden trail. 
For hikers, Lincolnshire Park, about 13 miles away in Tazewell, has features so beautiful you will think you're in the The Hobbit's  "Shire." 
For other things to do and places to eat, see my Guidebook section of Guest Resources.

The Town of Bluefield, Va. operates Graham Transit. Graham Transit runs three deviated fixed routes throughout the area each day. I am a 5 minute walk from the closest bus route stop.  Bus route schedules are listed on the Town of Bluefield, Va. official website.

Please have the the Airbnb "describe yourself" profile questions filled out (type traveler you are, etc) before you request to book. Also, the local (county) occupancy tax is included in the room price.

CHECKOUT: If your stay is on a Saturday, I request a 9 a.m. Sunday checkout, but any other day it's 10 a.m. as listed.Thank you!

sectionedDescription/description:
Bramwell Adventures (formerly Bramwell ATV Resort) offers a comfortable stay in Appalachian paradise. Our 6 riverfront rentals are a minute from the Hatfield-McCoy trails. If fishing's more your thing the Bluestone River is right out back. White-water rafting on the world-renowned Gauley or New River, zip-lining, hiking, biking or horseback riding at Pipestem Resort State Park...whatever fun mountain stuff you're into, you'll find it nearby.

The Sowers House is a riverfront house with a full kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, dining room, living room, and individually controlled air conditioning.  The maximum capacity is 10 guests.  Sleeping accommodations include 1 queen bed, 1 full bed and 3 bunk beds. (A pull-out couch in the living room may be used to increase occupancy from 10 guests to 12.)  The kitchen is equipped with full-size refrigerator, oven/stove, dishes, pots, pans, cooking and eating utensils, coffee pot and microwave oven. WiFi is included, as well as onsite parking for trailers, trucks, and ATVs at no additional cost to our guests.

Holiday weekends during high season (April-October) require a three-night minimum stay. Off-season dates (November-March) require a two-night minimum stay.  If you're interested in kayaking the Bluestone River, please speak with owner to make arrangements.

name: Whispering Pines Private Cabin 5 mins off I-77
primaryHost/about: We are a nature loving and hard working family. We came to Bland several years ago for the beauty and private way of living. Walkers Valley is one of the most beautiful places you will ever see. Serenity, peacefulness, and the beauty of the mountains, are all the reasons we moved here.  We invite you, our guests, to come and see for yourself. We promise, if you love the outdoors as much as we do, you will be able to appreciate the beauty of Bland, Va.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Guest have full access to the cabin and pond. Children MUST be supervised at all times.
sectionedDescription/description:
Enchanted cozy cabin " Whispering Pines " located 5 minutes off I-77 in Bland, Va.  Our cabin is  located on 8 acres of property and full  of various types of wildlife.  Sometimes, you will see bear, deer, wild turkey, and squirrels. We also live on the property, but the cabin is private and  tucked away within the beautiful whispering pines.

. The interior has recently been updated with appliances and decor including farmhouse style. The exterior of the cabin has also been recently renovated. There is a  peaceful fire pit for your family to enjoy.  You will need an All Wheel Drive (AWD) or Four -Wheel Drive vehicle (4x4) in order to drive all the way to the cabin because the incline is a little steep for a 2 wheel drive. There  is a parking lot at the top of this incline for all the Non-AWD and Non-4x4 vehicles.  Please note, you will only have to walk approximately 75 yards down the hill to the cabin. The other Parking lot is at the bottom. Upon request, a pack & play can be provided for your baby or toddler. The cabin is NOT wheelchair accessible and has NO WIFI! Cell service is limited to Verizon, however AT&T will pick up 1 bar and LTE. The cabin has No cable TV; however, there is a 42 inch TV available with multi-selection DVDs for adults and children.  We have also included a selection of books for adults and children. Our property has 2 ponds,  a mid-sized refrigerator, sink, dishes, pots/pans,  silverware, cooking utensils, and a Keurig coffee pot. Enjoy your evening sitting by the firepit or gazebo by the pond. Although, our water source is from freshwater springs, we do advise not to drink, to be on the safe side; however you can boil the water for drinking and cooking. We will provide each guest with one bottle of drinking water.  Whispering Pines cabin is sparkling clean and  very quiet with a peaceful rustic setting.

Guest have full access to the cabin and pond. Children MUST be supervised at all times.

Available by cell phone.

This cabin is nestled in the Blue Ridge mountains surrounded by the Washington Jefferson National Forest. There are many Appalachian trail heads  in Bland county and  many things to do nearby. The closest Appalachian trailhead from the cabin is only 2.1 miles. Fort Chiswell Animal Park(16 miles), Wytheville (11 miles), Dismal Falls Retreat (14 miles), Wolf Creek Indian village and Museum (5.3 miles), Big Walker Lookout (10.6 miles), Dollar General (2.1 miles), Grants supermarket (1.8 miles), and some of the best sandwiches, cheeses, furniture, and Amish hospitality around,  Walkers Valley Market(16 miles).

24 hours before your arrival I will provide you a Key Code for the Lock Box.

primaryHost/about:
Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Partake in endless outdoor activities while staying at ‘Snowed Inn,’ a ski-in/ski-out 4-bedroom, 3-bath Ghent vacation rental cabin! The property offers a kitchen to prepare home-cooked meals, a TV to watch your favorite shows, and a gas grill to cook outdoors. Friends and family will enjoy instant access to Winterplace Ski Resort, West Virginia's most southern ski mountain. Ski, snow tube, hike, and so much more before relaxing at this charming home!

* NOTE: Due to Covid-19, the Lodge at Winter Place is currently closed *

Bedroom 1: Queen Bed, Twin Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: Queen Bed | Bedroom 4: 2 Queen Beds | Second Floor Living Room: Queen Sleeper Sofa, Twin Sleeper Sofa | Third Floor Living Room: Queen Sleeper Sofa, Twin Sleeper Sofa, Twin Bed 

Upon arrival to this two-story 2,000-square-foot cabin, drop off your bags and strap on your skis to immediately shred the snowy hills of Winterplace Ski Resort! You'll love the option of returning home when you desire while your fellow guests continue to play in the frozen landscape. 

During your downtime, relax in the warm living area featuring family-friendly entertainment on the flat-screen cable TV and sumptuous leather couches. If you find yourself feeling crowded, head upstairs to the third floor, boasting an additional living area with a second flat-screen cable TV and quaint kitchenette. 

After a strenuous day outside, you'll be ready for a delicious homemade meal! Whip up whatever you're craving the in the fully equipped kitchen and savor it around the 6-person dining table. 

Thoroughly tired, retreat to one of the 3 comfortable bedrooms found on the second floor or venture upstairs to the third floor to dream in 2 plush queen-sized beds. No matter where you sleep in the home, you're guaranteed to wake up feeling refreshed and ready for the next adventure!

** Please note that this unit is the 2nd and 3rd floor of a 3-story chalet with separate entrances so there may be other travelers staying on the 1st floor during your stay **

Evolve makes it easy to find and book properties you’ll never want to leave. You can relax knowing that our properties will always be ready for you and that we’ll answer the phone 24/7. Even better, if anything is off about your stay, we’ll make it right. You can count on our homes and our people to make you feel welcome--because we know what vacation means to you.

Located at the base of Winterplace Ski Resort, this home allows you to wake up to views of skiers and snowboarders riding the lift up to the top of the mountain. Join the fun on the 27 trails ranging from easy-to-difficult terrain served by 9 lifts! 

Additionally, snowboarders will love testing their skills on rails, tabletops, and other obstacles including a half-pipe. If you can't make it out during the day, hit the illuminated runs at night! 

Everyone will adore speeding down one of the 10 lanes at West Virginia's largest snow tubing park! If you prefer a slower pace, relax at one of the several restaurants while you enjoy a refreshing beer and warm meal. You might also enter into the Karaoke Contest on Saturdays to win cool prizes! 

If you visit during the warmer months, seek out scenic hikes at destinations such as Bluestone State Park or Pipestem Resort State Park, both located within 19 miles of the home. Afterward, enjoy a family picnic, swim, or even horseback ride! Adrenaline junkies might prefer whitewater rafting down the New River or rock climbing in the New River Gorge!

Furthermore, you'll find golf courses such as Glade Springs Resort Golf Course, fun events like art festivals, and delicious restaurants including Skyline Lodge all within a close distance to the property.

Key Residence Features:
- Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen, kitchenette, gas grill, 2 flat-screen cable TVs, linens/towels, in-unit laundry machines, free WiFi, complimentary toiletries, air conditioning, 10 driveway parking spots, and so much more 
- Incredible Ghent location at the base of Winterplace Ski Resort - Ski, snowboard, and snow tube instantly during your stay at this ski-in/ski-out rental property! In addition, you're also close to scenic hikes, golfing, and other outdoor activities!
- Nearest Commercial Airport: Greenbrier Valley Airport (~59 miles away)
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- No smoking
- No pets allowed
- No events, parties, or large gatherings
- Must be at least 25 years old to book
- Additional fees and taxes may apply
- Photo ID may be required upon check-in
- NOTE: There is another vacation rental unit on the premises, and there may be other travelers present during your stay
- NOTE: If you're traveling with a larger group, check the availability of Evolve listing #402193. The property is located on the floor below and accommodates 9 additional guests
- NOTE: The Winterplace Ski lodge is seasonal, and generally opens around December 15, depending on the weather. Call the lodge directly to check the snow conditions if you plan on booking this house to ski
- NOTE: This property requires stairs to access
- NOTE: Due to Covid-19, the Lodge at Winter Place is currently closed
sectionedDescription/interaction: Evolve makes it easy to find and book properties you’ll never want to leave. You can relax knowing that our properties will always be ready for you and that we’ll answer the phone 24/7. Even better, if anything is off about your stay, we’ll make it right. You can count on our homes and our people to make you feel welcome--because we know what vacation means to you.
sectionedDescription/name: Ski-In/Ski-Out Ghent Cabin w/ Mountain Views!
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie:
Located at the base of Winterplace Ski Resort, this home allows you to wake up to views of skiers and snowboarders riding the lift up to the top of the mountain. Join the fun on the 27 trails ranging from easy-to-difficult terrain served by 9 lifts! 

Additionally, snowboarders will love testing their skills on rails, tabletops, and other obstacles including a half-pipe. If you can't make it out during the day, hit the illuminated runs at night! 

Everyone will adore speeding down one of the 10 lanes at West Virginia's largest snow tubing park! If you prefer a slower pace, relax at one of the several restaurants while you enjoy a refreshing beer and warm meal. You might also enter into the Karaoke Contest on Saturdays to win cool prizes! 

If you visit during the warmer months, seek out scenic hikes at destinations such as Bluestone State Park or Pipestem Resort State Park, both located within 19 miles of the home. Afterward, enjoy a family picnic, swim, or even horseback ride! Adrenaline junkies might prefer whitewater rafting down the New River or rock climbing in the New River Gorge!

Furthermore, you'll find golf courses such as Glade Springs Resort Golf Course, fun events like art festivals, and delicious restaurants including Skyline Lodge all within a close distance to the property.
sectionedDescription/notes:
Key Residence Features:
- Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen, kitchenette, gas grill, 2 flat-screen cable TVs, linens/towels, in-unit laundry machines, free WiFi, complimentary toiletries, air conditioning, 10 driveway parking spots, and so much more 
- Incredible Ghent location at the base of Winterplace Ski Resort - Ski, snowboard, and snow tube instantly during your stay at this ski-in/ski-out rental property! In addition, you're also close to scenic hikes, golfing, and other outdoor activities!
- Nearest Commercial Airport: Greenbrier Valley Airport (~59 miles away)
sectionedDescription/space:
* NOTE: Due to Covid-19, the Lodge at Winter Place is currently closed *

Bedroom 1: Queen Bed, Twin Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: Queen Bed | Bedroom 4: 2 Queen Beds | Second Floor Living Room: Queen Sleeper Sofa, Twin Sleeper Sofa | Third Floor Living Room: Queen Sleeper Sofa, Twin Sleeper Sofa, Twin Bed 

Upon arrival to this two-story 2,000-square-foot cabin, drop off your bags and strap on your skis to immediately shred the snowy hills of Winterplace Ski Resort! You'll love the option of returning home when you desire while your fellow guests continue to play in the frozen landscape. 

During your downtime, relax in the warm living area featuring family-friendly entertainment on the flat-screen cable TV and sumptuous leather couches. If you find yourself feeling crowded, head upstairs to the third floor, boasting an additional living area with a second flat-screen cable TV and quaint kitchenette. 

After a strenuous day outside, you'll be ready for a delicious homemade meal! Whip up whatever you're craving the in the fully equipped kitchen and savor it around the 6-person dining table. 

Thoroughly tired, retreat to one of the 3 comfortable bedrooms found on the second floor or venture upstairs to the third floor to dream in 2 plush queen-sized beds. No matter where you sleep in the home, you're guaranteed to wake up feeling refreshed and ready for the next adventure!

** Please note that this unit is the 2nd and 3rd floor of a 3-story chalet with separate entrances so there may be other travelers staying on the 1st floor during your stay **
sectionedDescription/summary: Partake in endless outdoor activities while staying at ‘Snowed Inn,’ a ski-in/ski-out 4-bedroom, 3-bath Ghent vacation rental cabin! The property offers a kitchen to prepare home-cooked meals, a TV to watch your favorite shows, and a gas grill to cook outdoors. Friends and family will enjoy instant access to Winterplace Ski Resort, West Virginia's most southern ski mountain. Ski, snow tube, hike, and so much more before relaxing at this charming home!

additionalHouseRules:
HOUSE RULES & OCCUPANCY:
The rental is not intended for parties, nor gatherings at any time. Absolutely NO Parties are to be held on the property. The property is meant for nice quiet getaways, it is NOT set up for parties. If there is excessive noise or music, any illegal activity, or evidence of violation of these policies, you may be asked to vacate the premise without any refund and additional charges may be assessed. 
NO Smoking:  Smoking is NOT permitted in our property. Smoking is allowed outside as long as butts and ashes are not left behind. Discard the butts and ashes in the outside garbage or fire pit. Do not throw butts on the ground or bring them into the home. If there is tobacco smell in the home after your departure, you may be required to pay an additional $250 charge for deep cleaning.
Damage Charges:
Any damages, outside of what is deemed as normal wear and tear, are the responsibility of the guest.  Charges for repairs are non-negotiable. 

Pets: We are dog friendly; dogs are allowed upon approval. A non-refundable pet fee of $39 per pet will be charged prior to arrival. You are responsible for walking and cleaning up after your pet. All waste must be picked up and placed in the garbage cans tied securely in trash bags. Pets may not be left unattended in the home unless kenneled. We ask that you do not allow your pets on the furniture or bedding, and that you clean up any pet hair before you depart. Any signs of pet debris inside or outside rental may be required to pay an additional $250 for deep cleaning.

name: The Litz Mansion Room #8 - The Colonel May Room
sectionedDescription/description:
This beautiful historic mansion was constructed in 1859 by John Warfield Johnston, a Virginia Senator, and Judge of Tazewell County. The home is situated on a 3.16-acre lot and is conveniently located within walking distance of the Tazewell Main Street area. The Johnston family was very well known in Virginia for their achievements and built the home to display these accomplishments. 

John, his wife Nicketti and son George lived in the home until it was purchased by John C. Hopkins and wife E

Room #8 - The Colonel May Room (Shared Bathroom)

The Colonel May room is dedicated to the youngest son of Andrew Jackson and Nelle May. Andrew named his son “Colonel” in hopes to pass along some of the luster and reputation of his own name. This room is fit for a Colonel and styled for one too. With all the furnishings being dark, rich mahogany, and walnut. A favorite talking piece of this room is the beautiful stone capped foot boards. And of course, the guests who stay in this room are in love with the upper porch located just a few steps outside the room door, perfect for enjoying and relaxing.

sectionedDescription/description:
We are a family orientated facility, proud to offer quality large two-bedroom apartments featuring spacious private bathrooms, entertainment space, full kitchens. Bramwell, “Home of the Millionaires” is not to be missed!
We are ATV friendly and parking is available for trucks and trailers. The original Pocahontas Trailhead is just down the road. Pocahontas connects you to Pinnacle Creek and Warrior trail systems as well as outlaw trails.
This apartment has 1 king, 1 queen, & 1 full sleeper sofa.

sectionedDescription/description:
Main Street Lodging has available a second floor apartment​​ in a quiet residential area in the heart of Gilbert with easy access to the Hatfield McCoy Trail.  The Apartment has three bedrooms and can accommodate up to 12 guests.  One bedroom has two queen beds and two bedrooms have two full-sized beds. Main Street Lodging has available a second floor apartment​​ in a quiet residential area in the heart of Gilbert with easy access to the Hatfield McCoy Trail.  The Apartment has three bedrooms and can accommodate up to 12 guests.  One bedroom has two queen beds and two bedrooms have two full-sized beds.  A fully equipped kitchen, including pots, pans, silverware, glasses, dishes, coffeemaker, toaster, crockpot, and a microwave is at your disposal.  You will also find a full-sized washer and dryer located off the kitchen.  A patio area with a fire pit is available for you to relax and enjoy the area.  Plenty of parking is available for your vehicles and trailers.  You can ride your ATV/UTV or dirt bike to the trail entrance, to restaurants, the grocery store, and to all the shops in town.  ​​​​​​​

Gusts will use a 4 digit code to enter using the keypad lock.

Located right in the heart of Gilbert, WV.  Just up from the Speedway gas station in town.
