photos/102/caption: Fishing...catch and release...in the pond directly behind the cottage!
primaryHost/about: I'm a mom of 6 and stay home with our two youngest boys (who are 5 and 8.)  I love to garden, cook, can, sew, play the piano, read non-fiction, write, create and dream.  I have authored two books, "Fairly-Popular Fairy Tales and Classic Cookery" and "The Dandelion King."  I enjoy taking care of our animals (dog, cats, ducks, chickens, and turkey)  My husband and I are converting our 2 bedroom, 1940s house, into a castle. (I draw and he builds.)  We also design and build quirky playhouses and enjoy taking amazing road trips with our kids. Oh- and I collect pencils. :-)
sectionedDescription/access:
The entire Cottage is for your use.  

Rental of the cottage includes a souvenir fishing permit.  This will give you complete access to the fishing supplies in Ishmael's Tackle Shop.  Ishmael's is located just below the cottage- we'll have it unlocked for you.  We do require that after any photographs, you throw your fish back in the pond. (Swimming is not allowed in the pond.) (Ice skating on the pond is also not allowed.)

We are currently building a pencil museum for Jill's collection.  The pencil museum opens up to our Blackberry Boardwalk.  It's a nice walkway through the edge of the woods near the pond.  It also helps make the blackberries more accessible during season (they're typically ripe in August and you're welcome to help yourself!) Although the museum is still in a construction phase, the Blackberry Boardwalk is complete.

Also, we are located in a very popular area for ATV riders.  We are 38.8 miles to the Pocahontas Trail Head (Hatfield & McCoy ATV & UTV Trails).  You are welcome to use any tools in our garage for maintenance of your ATV or UTV while you are visiting. 

You're free to walk throughout the property, including the gardens.  Please also treat the gardens like a buffet.  You're welcome to eat all of the vegetables and fruit you want while you're here.  You're also welcome to help with any animal chores and gardening (especially fun for kids!) and we love to answer any questions you have.

When it is time for your check-out, you can just walk away!  No cleaning or locking up needed.  We like for folks to be able to completely relax and not worry about any of the details. :-)
sectionedDescription/description:
Stay in the Storybook Cottage at the Holliday Castle!  The Storybook Cottage is a tiny crooked fairytale house located behind our home (which is being converted into a castle!)  Enjoy the view from your private back porch! Close to ski resort!

The Storybook Cottage is a fairytale-inspired tiny crooked house.  The Cottage is located directly behind our house - which is in the process of being converted into a castle. Our property houses apple trees, plum trees, cherry trees, grapevines, peach trees, blackberries, raspberries, blueberries, and pear trees- in addition to mass quantities of vegetables. 

In the photographs posted, you'll be able to see more about the property, the placement of the Cottage in relation to the main house, and some of the animals. :-)

In the Cottage, you'll find books, board games, and general whimsy. During the late spring and summer, the front porch opens up into an edible front yard- feel free to help yourself!  The back porch overlooks the pond (beautiful, but not suitable for skating!).  Rental of the cottage comes with access to the fishing supplies located in Ishmael's Tackle Shop.  Ishmael's is located just below the cottage- we keep it unlocked for our guests.  (However, swimming is not allowed in the pond- and when it's frozen over, no skating is allowed either.)

The Cottage is a tiny house, yet still has a lot of amenities!  You have your own private kitchenette, equipped with a sink, mini-fridge, breakfast station (which includes a coffee pot, toaster oven and griddle), a microwave and a table with seats for two.  (Due to the size of this kitchenette, we were unable to include a traditional oven with stovetop. If you have any questions about the kitchenette, please just let us know! ) This kitchenette also includes dishes (mugs, larger cups, plates, bowls and silverware)  and a folding tray for reading or enjoying your meals in bed.  During the warmer season, we provide a retro cooler for your use while fishing or picnicking.

You will also have your own private bathroom with an antique sink and claw foot tub (with shower).  We provide you with towels, washcloths, soap, shampoo, conditioner, bubble bath and a hair dryer. (If you've forgotten anything else, just let us know- we probably have extras!)

The Cottage also has, what we call, a "mud room."  It's a small room where you'll find a bench and a picnic basket (during season).  During the holidays, the mudroom is decked out with a Christmas tree. The mudroom is intended as a place for you to unload, store your umbrella and shed your shoes.  In the winter months, this room is also outfitted with boot warmers.  

The main room houses a queen size bed, a rocking chair, a tv (w/ dvd player), and a dresser (which converts into a lighted desk.) We also provide you with an iron and ironing board.  There is not a closet; however, there is a hook on the door for hanging your garment bag. The bedding is composed of two down alternative pillows, two "SpaLuxury" pillows, and two 100% cotton blankets.  There are three separate heaters located throughout the cottage. There is also a window air conditioner. The main room/bedroom overlooks the pond with an entire wall of windows (don't worry- there are room-darkening curtains if you prefer to sleep in!)  

If you would like to bring your child(ren), please send me a message beforehand.  I am sure that a small air mattress will fit beside the queen size bed (and I will prepare it for you!), but I want to share exact dimensions with you to ensure you'll be pleased with the layout of the room. Also, if you're bringing young children, please let me know!  I will ensure the cottage is stocked with some age-appropriate toys. 

Regarding breakfast, your kitchen will be stocked with a standard brew of coffee, as well as tea bags.  Upon your arrival, you will find a basket of fruit and zucchini bread (or something similar), as well as a couple bottles of water in your fridge. We have decided to leave this welcome/breakfast basket for you so as not to disturb your sleep the next morning.  During the winter months, your kitchen is also stocked with hot cocoa mix.

We currently have a dog, cats, and a chicken.  This past winter has been hard on the animals.  Pumpkin, our pet turkey passed away, as well as our duck, and one of the chickens. This spring (2023), we will be getting baby chickens, ducks and turkeys.

**Update April 2023:  We had a very bad windstorm and a handsome little rooster blew in and has fallen deeply in love with our Chicken Little.  They have moved into Pumpkin's old house and are inseparable. We realize he's an early riser and not all of us are--- so we are now providing ear plugs for each guest in the cottage (just in case.)

The entire Cottage is for your use.  

Rental of the cottage includes a souvenir fishing permit.  This will give you complete access to the fishing supplies in Ishmael's Tackle Shop.  Ishmael's is located just below the cottage- we'll have it unlocked for you.  We do require that after any photographs, you throw your fish back in the pond. (Swimming is not allowed in the pond.) (Ice skating on the pond is also not allowed.)

We are currently building a pencil museum for Jill's collection.  The pencil museum opens up to our Blackberry Boardwalk.  It's a nice walkway through the edge of the woods near the pond.  It also helps make the blackberries more accessible during season (they're typically ripe in August and you're welcome to help yourself!) Although the museum is still in a construction phase, the Blackberry Boardwalk is complete.

Also, we are located in a very popular area for ATV riders.  We are 38.8 miles to the Pocahontas Trail Head (Hatfield & McCoy ATV & UTV Trails).  You are welcome to use any tools in our garage for maintenance of your ATV or UTV while you are visiting. 

You're free to walk throughout the property, including the gardens.  Please also treat the gardens like a buffet.  You're welcome to eat all of the vegetables and fruit you want while you're here.  You're also welcome to help with any animal chores and gardening (especially fun for kids!) and we love to answer any questions you have.

When it is time for your check-out, you can just walk away!  No cleaning or locking up needed.  We like for folks to be able to completely relax and not worry about any of the details. :-)

You will see us on the property.  We have five children living here, ranging in age from seven to eighteen.  Don't worry- they will not bother you at all- but you will probably see them outside playing.  If you need anything, I am a stay-at-home mom and am easily accessible during the day.  I can frequently be found in the kitchen, our library or the greenhouse.  We dearly love to show folks around our place and answer any questions you may have about our home, gardens, animals and/or the area.

We are only a little over a mile from I-77.  We are less than a mile from Winterplace Ski Resort, Dollar General, Exxon and Little General Gas Stations, Ski Barn, and the Ghent Post Office.  We are almost exactly halfway between Princeton, WV and Beckley, WV.  We are 17 miles from Beckley and 22 miles from Princeton.

**Important to note:  We are a castle-in-progress, so you will see construction materials in the common areas.  Believe me, we're working as fast as we can! :-) Thank you for understanding!

name: Perfectly located two bedroom duplex in Welch WV
primaryHost/about: My wife Elise and I have lived in McDowell County since November 2015. We moved from New England to help the community through outreach and ministry and we've fallen in love with the area and the people here. We love to go for walks, listen to music, travel anywhere & everywhere, and meet new friends.
sectionedDescription/description:
This home is located within walking distances of downtown Welch and the Welch Community Hospital.

Our home has two units, the one that you will be staying in is our downstairs unit.  The upstairs unit has a separate entrance by an outside staircase.  Our downstairs unit has two bedrooms, one bathroom and a spacious great room that combines the kitchen, dinning room and living room.

name: Almost Heaven ATV resort-Lower
photos/3/caption: Beautiful bathroom with all the towels and wash cloths that you may need ~
photos/5/caption: Beautiful sundeck with a fire pit to enjoy those summer nights ~
sectionedDescription/description:
- Very close to The Hatfield McCoy Trail in Welch, WV
- FREE Wi-Fi
- Air Conditioning
- Sundeck
- FREE Parking for up to 5 trucks w/trailers
- Restaurants Drug Store within walking distance

Looking for a thrilling outdoor experience? Our resort boasts miles of world-class ATV trails that are perfect for adventurers of all levels. Explore the picturesque forests and breathtaking mountains of West Virginia on your ATV, and enjoy an unforgettable experience that will leave you wanting more.

Beautiful sundeck with a fire pit to enjoy on those cool summer nights!

We are open 24 hours a day / 7 days a week.

Close to The Hatfield McCoy Trail and The Pocahontas Theater in Welch, WV

Restaurants, movie theater, and drug store are within walking distance

additionalHouseRules:
The Landlord has the right to inspect the premises without prior notice at any time to enforce the terms of this agreement. Should the Tenants violate any of the terms of this agreement, the rental period shall be terminated immediately. The Tenants waive all rights to process if they fail to vacate the premises upon termination of the rental period. The Tenants shall vacate the premises at the expiration time and date of this agreement.

There is an international calling block on the telephone - a calling card is needed for international calls. Emergency medical and police service can be called by dialing 911.

The Tenants shall maintain the premises in a good, clean, and ready to rent condition, and use the premises only in a careful and lawful manner. The tenants shall leave the premises in a ready to rent condition at the expiration of the rental agreement, defined by the Landlord as being immediately habitable by the next tenants. Tenants shall pay for maintenance and repairs should the premises be left in a lesser condition. The tenants agree that the Landlord shall deduct costs of said services from the security deposit prior to refund if tenants cause damage to the premises or its furnishings.

The Tenants shall dispose of all waste material generated during the rental period in a lawful manner and put bagged trash in the bin along the fence near the roadway for pickup. Tenant is cautioned not to leave trash outside because it attracts animals.

The Tenants shall pay for any damage done to the premises over and above normal wear and tear.

No animals or pets of any kind will be brought onto the premises.

The Tenants shall not sublet the property.

The Tenants shall have no more than [RGUESTS_TOTAL] persons reside or sleep on the premises. The Tenants shall notify Landlord immediately if the planned number of guests increases. Tenants renting a unit with per-person charges authorize a charge of $20 per night per person if more than [RGUESTS_TOTAL] persons reside or sleep on the premises.

The Tenants shall behave in a civilized manner and shall be good neighbors respecting the rights of the surrounding property owners. The Tenants shall not create noise or disturbances likely to disturb or annoy the surrounding property owners. Creating a disturbance of the above nature shall be grounds for immediate termination of this agreement and Tenants shall then immediately vacate the premises. Quiet hour starts at 10 PM and Pool and outdoor noise should be kept to a minimum.

There shall be no smoking inside the premises. Smoking is permitted outside the home.

Landlord shall provide towels, linens, cups, knives, forks, spoons, dishes, and other items as commonly used by the Landlord’s family. Toilet paper, soap, dish detergent, laundry soap, shampoos, and other consumables are to be purchased by the Tennant. No reimbursement will be made for unused consumables left at the premises. If consumables exist at the premises when the Tenant arrives the Tenant is free to use them...

The Tenants and Tenants' Guests shall hereby indemnify and hold harmless the Landlord against any and all claims of personal injury or property damage or loss arising from use of the premises regardless of the nature of the accident, injury or loss. Tenants expressly recognize that any insurance for property damage or loss which the Landlord may maintain on the property does not cover the personal property of Tenants, and that Tenants should purchase their own insurance for Tenants and Guests if such coverage is desired.

Tenants agree to pay all reasonable costs, attorney's fees and expenses that shall be made or incurred by Landlord enforcing this agreement.

Tenants expressly acknowledge and agree that this Agreement is for transient occupancy of the Property, and that Tenants do not intend to make the property a residence or household.

We occasionally experience outages that are beyond our control.  We report outages as each occurs.  No refunds or compensation will be given for any outages.

There shall be no refunds of rents due to shortened stays or ruined expectations because of weather conditions.

If the property should go on the MARKET FOR SALE, it may be shown to qualified buyers during the Tenants’ stay.  Every effort will be made to schedule the showing at a convenient time and not interrupt the Tenant’s vacation. Tenant shall allow reasonable viewings of the home between 9 am and 8 PM present or not.

There shall be no refunds of rents because of shortened stays or ruined expectations due to work and family emergencies or other commitments.

It is the tenant’s responsibility to learn about safety precautions, warning signs of water conditions, and safety procedures concerning swimming in or being around the pool. Tenant agrees to have a responsible adult supervising minors while they swim in the pool. Tenant is hereby notified that the pool can be dangerous and tenant accepts fully the risks involved. Tenant is further notified to be cautious when exiting the rear of the home as the pool is open and in close proximity to the entry ways and can be a hazard. There are no rails to prevent a fall into the pool.

Only legally owned and permitted firearms shall be allowed on the premises according to State and local laws.

Tenant agrees that Fireworks and other hazardous materials shall not be used in or around the property.

Tenant shall use the property for legal purposes only and other use, such as but not limited to, illegal drug use, abuse of any person, harboring fugitives, etc. ; shall cause termination of this agreement with no refund of rents or deposits.

Tenant agrees not to access the “owner’s closet”, even if unlocked, which contains cleaning supplies and chemicals that could be hazardous to children and adults. The owners closet is located just inside the main front entry way.

Tenant is advised that the property contains a gas stove and cook top, gas heating, gas grill, and other gas powered items and will seek help from management if the proper operation of such items is not fully understood.

The property has a fire extinguisher installed near the kitchen area. The fire extinguisher was fully charged at last inspection. It is the duty of the tenant to inform management immediately should the fire extinguisher become less than fully charged. Tenant agrees to use the fire extinguisher only for true emergencies.

The property has fire alarms installed and they are believed to function properly at the time of rental. Tennant will notify management without delay if a fire alarm “chirps” or has a low battery condition.

Tenant is advised that there is no carbon monoxide detector on the property and accepts the risk involved in not having one.

Tenant shall see to their own security while in the property by locking doors, windows, garage doors, etc. when it’s prudent to do so.

Valuable items left behind by tenant will be held for the tenant and every reasonable effort will be made to contact the tenant for return. If items are not claimed for longer than 6 months they shall become the property of the Landlord. The Landlord shall not be held liable for condition of said items.

Cable TV is provided and service level has been chosen by the Landlord. No refund of rents shall be given for outages, content, lack of content, or personal preferences with regard to cable TV service.

High speed wireless internet is provided as a convience only and is not integral to the agreement. No refund of rents shall be given for outages, content, lack of content, speed, access problems, lack of knowledge of use, or personal preferences with regard to internet service.

Tenant agrees that Air conditioning shall not be set below 73 degrees and heat shall not be set above 78, and that the fan setting shall be “Auto”. Doors and windows shall be closed when either heat or air conditioning is in operation.

(Applicable only if "Trail Map Tablet" is rented) Tenant understands that the Trail Map Tablet is provided "as is," and that the maps installed on the tablet were created by a third party and have not been verified for accuracy, safety, legality or difficulty by Landlord. Tenant agrees to follow all applicable federal, state and local laws, and Hatfield-McCoy Trails' rules and regulations as applicable, when using the Trail Map Tablet. Tenant shall agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Landlord from liability and claim for damages that arise from use of the Trail Map Tablet, including but not limited to: injury, illness, death, property damage, and criminal charges.

(Applicable only if "Trail Map Tablet" is rented) Tenant agrees that in the event the Trail Map Tablet is lost, stolen, damaged or destroyed, Tenant will be billed according to the following schedule: $50 for mounting hardware, $150 for Trail Map Tablet. Loss of or damage to Trail Map Tablet must be reported immediately to Landlord, and broken items must be brought back to Four Wheeler Heaven. Tenant acknowledges that the Trail Map Tablet is not waterproof, and that it should not be submerged in water or used in rainy or snowy conditions.

primaryHost/about: I love the outdoors, especially riding the trails and exploring the mountains. I grew up and raised my family here enjoying the vast offroad trails this area has to offer, often riding all day to return at dusk with my son on his 90cc and me on my 325 Polaris.  We offer our guests the same opportunity but now the trails are mapped and marked  to make exploring easier.

sectionedDescription/access: Guests have access to private, secure parking for vehicles, trailers and ATVs; a heated swimming pool shared with other guests; and a back yard.
sectionedDescription/description:
This 3BR 2BA house with pool, is located Trailside at the Hatfield McCoy Pocahontas Trailhead at Coaldale WV. Direct access to Pocahontas Spearhead Trail in VA and 500mi of OFF Road adventures from our location On Rt 52 just 13 miles from I-77 exit 1

This upstairs unit features 3 bedroom, 2 full baths with a full kitchen, dining room, sun room, living room and a washer/dryer. It will sleep 10 or 12 and is fully equipped with towels, linens, utensils, coffeemaker, full size fridge, oven, pots/pans, microwave and crock pot, grills, picnic tables, fire-pits, basically everything you need to cook or heat up your meals. There is plenty of room to park your vehicles and unhook your trailers to be ready to go out on the town after a full day of trail riding or just kick back relax and enjoy the amenities. Direct "Trailhead" access to over 500 miles of West Virginia's Trails and Virginia's most popular trails. Ride Four Hatfield McCoy trail systems from our "Trailside" location: Pocahontas, Indian Ridge, Pinnacle and the new Warrior Trails and Virginia's Spearhead trails. We offer Trail permits, Trail GPS tablets, T-shirts, firewood and Guide services for applicable Fees. Discounts for multiple unit rentals (Coaldale Condo/Miners Den) available.Truly a Four Wheeler Heaven! Rent all three units for complete Privacy including the Pool Too ! Pool in season from Memorial to Labor Days.

Guests have access to private, secure parking for vehicles, trailers and ATVs; a heated swimming pool shared with other guests; and a back yard.

When you book, you'll be given a door code that will unlock the front door during your stay. Owners live 15 minutes away and can be reached by telephone anytime for questions or concerns.

Home is in a rural setting, surrounded by mountains, with few neighbors and many ATV trail systems within riding distance.

Located directly on Route 52, within 15 minute drive of shopping and dining in Bluefield and Princeton, WV. Bramwell is accessible via car (3 minutes) or ATV (15-20 minutes)

Trail permits are REQUIRED to ride on the Hatfield-McCoy Trail System. Please let us know if you need trail permits; we can include them in the total cost of your stay and have them ready when you arrive. Also note that listed rates do not include 12% tax (6% state and 6% local hotel/motel); if you choose to book, your rate will be adjusted 12% to include taxes. Atv rentals are available near by
sectionedDescription/houseRules:

Should the Tenants violate any of the terms of this agreement, the rental period shall be terminated immediately. The Tenants waive all rights to process if they fail to vacate the premises upon termination of the rental period. The Tenants shall vacate the premises at the expiration time and date of this agreement.

There is an international calling block on the telephone - a calling card is needed for international calls. Emergency medical and police service can be called by dialing 911.

The Tenants shall maintain the premises in a good, clean, and ready to rent condition, and use the premises only in a careful and lawful manner. The tenants shall leave the premises in a ready to rent condition at the expiration of the rental agreement, defined by the Landlord as being immediately habitable by the next tenants. The tenants agree that the Landlord shall deduct costs of said services from the security deposit prior to refund if tenants cause damage to the premises or its furnishings.

No animals or pets of any kind will be brought onto the premises.

rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access:
The Main Lodge is only rented to one group at a time. Only Your group will be inhabiting the house during your stay.  Our beautiful 5 bed room, 2 bath + bonus room with lounge is # 1 in Hatfield McCoy lodging. Visit our social media pages for a video walk through and keep up with the latest up dates to the  Busted Atv Resort  2000+ square foot Main Lodge. Holiday weekends are three night minimum.

Months that have cooler below freezing temperatures we do shut down the ATV pressure washer, guest laundry and outdoor showers.
sectionedDescription/description:
Ride dirty, Sleep clean! Busted ATV Resort offers you the very best in accommodations to ride the Hatfield McCoy trails.

The remodeled historic 1880 Bramwell House and adjacent  accommodations at the base of Mt. Me offer spacious accommodations with parking. Just a mile from Hatfield McCoy trail head and 5 miles from Virginia Spearhead trails. Pinnacle Rock State park and  Look Out is just one mile from our front door.

The Main Lodge is only rented to one group at a time. Only Your group will be inhabiting the house during your stay.  Our beautiful 5 bed room, 2 bath + bonus room with lounge is # 1 in Hatfield McCoy lodging. Visit our social media pages for a video walk through and keep up with the latest up dates to the  Busted Atv Resort  2000+ square foot Main Lodge. Holiday weekends are three night minimum.

Months that have cooler below freezing temperatures we do shut down the ATV pressure washer, guest laundry and outdoor showers.

Please feel free to call or text anytime.

The Busted ATV Resort is owned and operated by ATV nuts, for ATV nuts. Offering you the comforts of home including everything you need for the perfect stay.
 
Main lodge -Central heat and air, ceiling fans, wifi, smart streaming Tv's, large front porch, plenty of parking for your ATVs and Trailers, outdoor boot wash station,  Turbo Master Boot Dryer, laundry and more.

Winter Rates (November  13th - March 18th) are special accommodations that you must first contact us for availability and pricing before booking will be accepted . 

Here at Busted ATV Resort, one of the ways we offer you large beautifully remolded homes for a Great Price In-season months (April - October)is by Winterizing our homes during the cold months. This greatly reduces our cost and yours. If your planing a winter trip and would like to use the Resort contact us first. We require a 90 day notice on Bookings from mid November to Mid March.   Don't forget to follow us online for the latest info on Busted.

name: Hungry Mother Island. A unique cabin retreat.
primaryHost/about: My husband and I enjoying traveling around the world. We reside in southwestern Virginia and also enjoy spending time at the properties we share with you. We enjoy the outdoors especially spending time on the ski slopes!  I prefer clean, non-smoking, and unique places to stay and share the same with you.
sectionedDescription/access: Access to the cabin thru the park area is free. Guest can use any of the state park area for a small daily fee payable at the front gate.
sectionedDescription/description:
Hungry Mother Island is a unique three bedroom cabin on its own island surrounded by Hungry Mother Creek at Hungry Mother State Park in Marion, VA.  Located off the Back of the Dragon Trail &  bordered by Hungry Mother State Park along with George Washington & Jefferson National Forest.  Nearby multiple wilderness areas, superb mountain stream fishing, small lake fishing, swimming area & beach, wildlife management areas & miles of trails offer tons of natural amenities and outdoor opportunities.

Your own island!
Yes, this unique property 'Hungry Mother Island' offers the chance to stay surrounded by water on your own little island on Hungry Mother Creek at Hungry Mother State Park. This newly remodeled cabin offers three bedrooms (Max 6 occupancy on property) and two bathrooms with a jacuzzi tub in the downstairs bath. Eat in kitchen for four with stainless appliances, wood slab bar top and butcher block counter tops. Or have the entire family sit down to dinner around the interesting dining room table, all while seeing the creek flow by out of every window. Unwind on the sectional sofa in front of the stone fireplace while streaming your favorite show on the 60" TV. Relax on the rooftop patio or entertain under the lights on the stone patio while grilling out on the large stone fire/charcoal grill. The whole place is yours other than a couple of closet spaces and small areas we use for storage.

Access to the cabin thru the park area is free. Guest can use any of the state park area for a small daily fee payable at the front gate.

Will have someone available only if necessary.

https://www.google.com/amp/s/amp.usatoday.com/amp/725633002

Free parking in our packed gravel circle driveway.

This is a mid-century modern-rustic cabin that has been recently updated. Please note a few things about the property’s access and safety. The cabin is completely surrounded by water (unless it’s a dry season). Access to the cabin is via a small walk bridge. Guest will have to carry their belongings about 15 yards (small cart provided) across the bridge. Though the surrounding water is pretty shallow, don't allow children to be unattended, they can drown! The upstairs bedroom access is via a spiral staircase and not elderly, handicapped or child friendly. The upstairs patio has dated hand rails and does not provide child friendly safety railing. We welcome all guests no matter age or condition, but just want our guest to know what to plan for. There is an additional fee for more than 4 people and a maximum total of 6 people allowed. Due to the unique location of the house and the fragile waste water system; please note that there is a strict 6 person limit for our property. Unless prior arrangements have been made, in writing, guest exceeding this limit will be financially responsible for the cost to have the system pumped and serviced, plus additional cleaning fees, extra person fees and any damages or fees associated with ignoring the rules of our property. Misrepresentation of actual number of guests just to avoid the extra person fee will also incur additional cleaning fees, extra person fees and any damages or fees associated with ignoring the rules of our property. Please note we have a no pet policy. All additional costs shall be billed through Airbnb and any fees they charge may apply. By checking in to our property, guests accept these rules and the responsibilities listed above. If you do not accept and wish to cancel, you may do so within the cancellation period and receive a refund.  Thanks for your understanding as we only want to be able to share and enjoy our property for many years to come.

In addition, we have the privilege of offering you the opportunity to schedule a massage during your getaway.  A local massage therapist can travel to the cabin to offer massage therapy at your convenience.  Message us for details.

sectionedDescription/space:
Your own island!
Yes, this unique property 'Hungry Mother Island' offers the chance to stay surrounded by water on your own little island on Hungry Mother Creek at Hungry Mother State Park. This newly remodeled cabin offers three bedrooms (Max 6 occupancy on property) and two bathrooms with a jacuzzi tub in the downstairs bath. Eat in kitchen for four with stainless appliances, wood slab bar top and butcher block counter tops. Or have the entire family sit down to dinner around the interesting dining room table, all while seeing the creek flow by out of every window. Unwind on the sectional sofa in front of the stone fireplace while streaming your favorite show on the 60" TV. Relax on the rooftop patio or entertain under the lights on the stone patio while grilling out on the large stone fire/charcoal grill. The whole place is yours other than a couple of closet spaces and small areas we use for storage.
sectionedDescription/summary: Hungry Mother Island is a unique three bedroom cabin on its own island surrounded by Hungry Mother Creek at Hungry Mother State Park in Marion, VA.  Located off the Back of the Dragon Trail &  bordered by Hungry Mother State Park along with George Washington & Jefferson National Forest.  Nearby multiple wilderness areas, superb mountain stream fishing, small lake fishing, swimming area & beach, wildlife management areas & miles of trails offer tons of natural amenities and outdoor opportunities.
sectionedDescription/transit: Free parking in our packed gravel circle driveway.

name: Cozy Hill Cabin - near Hatfield and McCoy’s Trails
sectionedDescription/access: Access to whole cabin.
sectionedDescription/description:
***NO PETS
Log cabin with gorgeous wood details w/ the “bear~essentials” 3 beds/1.5 baths. Upstairs is open loft area with king bed and full bathroom. Downstairs has 2 bedrooms, one with 2 twins and other with queen bed. Pull out couch in the living room with plenty of room for an air mattress. Outdoor grill and fire pit area. Ride your SxS/UTV to town & trailheads.

Cabin with loft bedroom and 2 other bedrooms with a pull out full size couch.

Access to whole cabin.

Town is a old coal mining town that allows riding SxS and UTV’s on public roads. Close to many trailheads.

Cabin is located in the ATV friendly town of Boissevain and 4 miles from Pocahontas (9 miles from the Town of Bluefield) with access to Hatfield McCoy Pocahontas Trail which connects to Indian Ridge, Pinnacle Creek and Warrior trails along with the Original Pocahontas Spearhead Trail.

name: Bear Cabin -Hatfield & McCoy Trails
sectionedDescription/description:
Trail Bandits Cabins and Cottages are non-smoking, sleep up to 4 people and provide all the comforts of home. We are located near the Hatfield & McCoy trails in the Beautiful mountains of West Virginia. Cottages and cabins include Heat / AC mini splits, Free Wi-Fi, mini kitchen, Keurig coffee maker, refrigerator, three-quarter bath, 32” TV with Netflix/Directv, fresh linens, bath towels & housekeeping service. Outdoor fire pit and charcoal grill. Privacy fence on the premises.

Trail Bandits Cabins and Cottages comes with your own private picnic area, fire pit, charcoal grill and pinic table. There is also a second rental available,  " Papa's Den-Hatifield & McCoy Trails", on Airbnb as well that sleeps 3 people. These cabins are located on the same property. There is plenty of parking for trailers and ATVs / SXS and easy access to Hatfield and Mccoy Indian Ridge, Pinnacle Creek, Pocahontas and Warrior Trails.

Drive directly to the Hatifield and McCoy trailheads on your SXS. 
Large Parking lot at the cabins.

We pride ourselves on your fun and crazy adventure while staying at Trail Bandits Cabins. Please help us keep it just as fun for our community and our fellow campers. Please read over our rental terms and conditions.

As always, remember to UNLEASH YOUR ADVENTURE!

Our Policy

Cabin rental incidental deposits are non-refundable if your reservation is cancelled with less than 30 days remaining before your arrival date.  Deposits for holiday/holiday weekends are not refundable under any conditions if cancelled.

Reschedule requests will be only be accepted if there are 30 days or longer remaining before your scheduled arrival date.  These requests are subject to availability. * Inclement weather cancellations will not be accepted.

Failure to adhere to your reservation with no communication will forfeit your deposit and you will be charged the remaining balance of your stay.

Cabin Terms and Conditions

Check-in time is 3pm on your arrival date, and check out time is 11am on your departure date. 

Guests will be charged a one time $50 cleaning fee at the time of reservation.

Cabins are non-smoking.  Guests will be charged a one time $250 cleaning fee if smoking is detected inside the cabins and you will forfeit your deposit.

The maximum capacity per standard cabin is 3 adults.  The maximum capacity for our larger cabin is 4 adults.   Violators will be evicted, and no refund will be issued.  Small children will be exempt from this rule. 

Playing on loft ladders is prohibited. Face the ladder when going up or down. Do not carry objects in your hands while on the ladder.

Park ONLY in the designated parking areas which is in front of your cabin or across the road in the grass area.  

Alcohol is permitted.  Disorderly conduct is not allowed.

*No atv or any off road vehicles are allowed in any of the rivers.

Please honor the posted speed limit in our atv community.  

The reserving guests will be responsible for any damages to your cabin or premises. 

Please do not place, burn or leave trash in your fire pit. Outside charcoal grills need to be cleaned prior to the departure of your stay.

We ask that all guest respect your fellow campers and community. 

Quiet the noise after 10:00pm for respect of the community and other campers.

No excessive riding in the cabin areas or driveways.   No driving or parking your ATV on the grass where the charcoal grills and picnic tables are located.

There are outdoor surveillance cameras around the campground for the protection of your items.

Ready to Reserve!

You must reserve with an incidental deposit of $250. Incidental deposits are refundable upon checkout as long as there are no damages or additional charges made. If additional charges or damages occur during your stay, you will receive the incidental deposit back less the cost of damages or additional charges. Cabins cannot be reserved and will not be held without a deposit.

All rentals require a 2-night minimum.

Pet Friendly – We love Pets!

Trail Bandits Cabins offers pet friendly cabins. 

Pets that are non-aggressive are allowed with a $20 per pet surcharge per night.  No more than 1 pet is allowed per cabin unless approved by host for more.

All pets must be registered at check-in. If not registered and found on the premises, you will be evicted and deposit forfeited.

Excessive barking that is a disturbance to other campers will not be allowed.  

**Pets must be crated if left alone.

Pets should be on a leash at all times while outside. Please clean up any waste left by your pet.

Reserving guest is responsible for any damages caused by pets. If any damages occur, incidental deposit will be forfeited.

Pets must be 40 pounds or less due to insurance restrictions and campground policy procedures.

name: Hazel's Place ATV Riders Hideaway
sectionedDescription/description:
Bring your family and friends to stay at Hazels Place while you're visiting the Hatfield McCoy Trail System.  Leave your trucks and trailers at the house and ride your ATVs and SxSs to the trails from Hazels Place.  You're also able to ride from the house to restaurants, gas stations, grocery stores and much more.  After a rough day on the trail, come back to a beautiful home with 4 bathrooms to clean up in and relax by the circular firepit.  Full Kitchen available for feasts.

Lorton Lick Road, between Bluewell and Montcalm, WV

1/3 acre parking lot
can ride ATVs / SxSs to the trails from the property

name: OutlawHouse Riding in seconds!! Hatfield & McCoy
priceDetails/1/value: $15 per night after the first guest
sectionedDescription/description:
This is a vacation rental house that is located directly on the Outlaw trails of WV. We are also right in the middle of many Hatfield and McCoy trail systems.  You can ride these trails for months!! We believe we are in an excellent location to ride. Very close to the creek trail, local bars and places to eat as well as get passes for the trail systems

This house is set up for the quaintness of a couple of people to a huge group. You will have PLENTY of parking for your trucks and trailers. Great hangout areas outside after a long day of riding. There is a fire pit with a covered carport that has a gas grill as well as a charcoal grill. There is lighting and a huge picnic table. In the front is a nice porch with chairs and a swing very nice in the mornings.

You may contact us anytime you have questions or need any assistance

The wonderful part of this location is the area is safe with few neighbors. Nice and Quiet

You are allowed to ride your ATV's directly on the roads to the gas station, Family dollar to other towns WHEREVER! In case your machine has any issues there is a very close mechanic. We have personally used many many times.

sectionedDescription/description:
Great Location! Large Private Lot! Spacious 5 Bedroom / 3 Full Bath Home!
Private lot w/pond off Coal Heritage / Hwy 52  
Plenty of Parking!
Nearby Attractions
Goodson's Grocery Store - 1/2 mile
Gas - 1/2 mile
Wendy's - 1/2 mile
Sterling Drive In - Less than 5 miles
Car Wash - 1 to 2 miles
Warrior Trail & Outlaw Access - 1 mile
Wilimore Dam - 8 miles
Pinnacle Creek Indian Ridge Warrior Connector in Kimball - 10 miles
Berwind Lake - 17 miles
Linkous Park Public Pool - Just a few minutes in Welch

5 Bedrooms - 2 King, 1 Queen, 3 Full (more coming soon to the bunk room) 2 full sofa's, blow up mattress (Linens are provided)

Kitchen - Fully stocked with dishes, pots/pans, indoor grill, air fryer, crockpot, coffee pot (K-cups or standard pot) and more...
Large Living Room - 2 Full Sofas and 1 Love Seat (Cards and Poker Chips along with a few games are there for those rainy days)
Work Area w/desk and printer
Carport
Covered front porch, Covered side deck and uncovered deck behind garage

You will have access to the entire property

Quiet area just minutes from downtown Welch

name: Private Luxury Cabin located on the H&M Trails!
photos/15/caption: Bedroom 2
photos/16/caption: Bedroom 2
sectionedDescription/description:
Hidden Hollow ATV Ranch is located on the Hatfield McCoy Pocahontas trail system just outside of Montcalm, WV. We are positioned conveniently on the Pocahontas connector trail with access to our private 90 acre ranch via a ½ mile private dirt road.  We are perfect for couples or families looking for a more privacy and seclusion than the typical large resort or campground.  

Included with your stay are:

Linens/Pillows
Free Firewood
Free Ice
Satellite TV
Wifi
Pet Friendly 
2A Friendly

The cabin and its location is geared towards the off road community.

Cabin is located on 90 acres with no other guests but you!  Owners and property manager do live on the premises as well.

ATVs can be driven on all roads in the area

Need extra room?  We offer a 50A Full RV hookup next to the cabin for an additional fee.

Please note:  Property Manager lives onsite in nearby house.  We respect your privacy and we are riders as well.

After 2/1/2022 the second bedroom will no longer contain bunk beds.  There will be 2 queen beds in their place.

sectionedDescription/description: Located at 2264 Cherokee Road, the heart of ATV. Cherokee Road leads to 3 major trails. Indian Ridge Trail head is located approximately 3 minutes from location. Pinnacle Trail connector is located approximately 2 minutes from location. Pocahontas Trail Connecter is located approximately 15 minutes from location.  Outlaw Trails and Stair Steps are approximately 5 minutes from location. 2 mile from Ashland Resort. Enjoy some relaxation by the creek known for trout, fire pit and picnic tables.

name: Room 2 at Bramwell Adventures-2 Min. to Trail!
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Bramwell Adventures (formerly Bramwell ATV Resort) offers a comfortable stay in Appalachian paradise. Our 6 riverfront, pet-friendly* rentals are a minute from the Hatfield-McCoy trails. If fishing's more your thing the Bluestone River is right out back. White-water rafting on the world-renowned Gauley or New River, zip-lining, hiking, biking or horseback riding at Pipestem Resort State Park...whatever fun mountain stuff you're into, you'll find it nearby. *See Pet Policy in House Rules.

Room 2 is a single-room efficiency on the riverfront with a kitchenette, private bathroom and shower, 1 double bed, and

1 twin bed over a double bunk bed for a maximum capacity of 5 guests.  The kitchenette is equipped with a compact refrigerator, 2-eye hotplate, dishes, pots, pans, cooking and eating utensils, coffee pot and microwave oven. Rooms 1 and 2 are connected by a lockout door and may be rented together for a party of up to 12. WiFi is included, as well as onsite parking for trailers, trucks, and ATVs at no additional cost to our guests.

Holiday weekends during high season (April-October) require a three-night minimum stay. Off-season dates (November-March) require a two-night minimum stay.  Pets require an additional cleaning fee and guests must agree to pet policy.  (See House Rules for details.)  If you're interested in kayaking the Bluestone River, please speak with owner to make arrangements.

photos/0/caption: Efficiency kitchenette complete with microwave,  mini fridge,  k-cup coffee pot, crockpot,  griddle, dishes and silverware.
photos/1/caption: Private entrance with electronic lock for hassle free check in.

photos/13/caption: Rick and I own the Icecream shop in town. Open seasonally April-October Thurs-Sat 12-9pm. Come by and see us and get 10% off your order.
photos/14/caption: The Owl- serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner You can have burgers, fries and onion rings, and top it off with a milk shake.
photos/15/caption: Warrior Trailhead office on River Rd. You can purchase HMT trail passes as well as souvenirs open 9am-2pm daily.
photos/16/caption: Berwind Lake with boating and trout fishing
primaryHost/about:
My husband and I relocated to West Virginia in 2014 from Ohio. We run a ministry (A New Beginning) located downtown. 
We opened A Bit of Heaven Rental in Sept. 2018 when the trails opened in our area. We currently have 5 units we rent. We also opened A Scoop of Heaven Icecream in 2021.
We live local across the street from The Calvary House and are available if you need us. We love the small town atmosphere that our town has to offer and the friendly folks that live here.
I love to cook and spend time with our family and grandbabies. 
We enjoy meeting new people, having cookouts in the summer, and going to the lake.

sectionedDescription/access:
Guest have full access with private entrance and private parking. This unit is part of the main house but you will be amazed at how private it is.
Your own outdoor space with a firepit and bbq grill.
sectionedDescription/description:
Take a step back in time. Rural America. Before fast food chains, and even before Walmart...

Surrounded by Mountains and conveniently located, direct access to Warrior Trailhead and High Rocks. Enjoy Wilmore Dam, or perhaps a day at Berwind Lake trout fishing, or hiking.

This can be purchased with the main house or as a stand alone unit. If purchased together the price will be reduced to $40 a night.
 Guest will have entire space to themselves.

Cozy suite convient for 1 or 2 people looking for a peaceful getaway. Features 1 Bedroom/1 Full Bath, and a Kitchenette with breakfast nook (refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker.) Comes with clean linens, towels, and bedding. 
Bedroom has a flatscreen TV with Roku access (Netflix, Prime etc.) and WIFI.
Has a private entrance.  Perfect for traveling with a group that purchases the main house but likes your own space or traveling as a couple alone.

Like us on Facebook to stay up to date on what's going on in the area.

Guest have full access with private entrance and private parking. This unit is part of the main house but you will be amazed at how private it is.
Your own outdoor space with a firepit and bbq grill.

Our Mission is to make your stay at The Cove Suite as enjoyable as possible.

We live locally and respect your privacy. We'll give you the space that you want or the help that you need.

Quiet Neighborhood, close to everything. Welcoming small town with all the conveniences.
Restaurants, grocery store and gas station. 

Warrior Trail with direct connection to Pinnacle Creek,  Indiana Ridge, and Pocahantas Trail.

Located off of RT 16 WV

War is a ATV friendly town, you are welcome to ride your ATV anywhere for the duration of your stay. No trailering to the trailhead entrance.

Day trips in the area:
86 Miles to New River Gorge
64 Miles to Beckley Exibition Coal Miner Youth Museum

**Check out our other Listing**

photos/15/caption: The most recent copy of the trail map.

primaryHost/about: I enjoy traveling to new places and meeting new people. my children are my favorite people on earth!
sectionedDescription/access: guess have entire apartment with private entrance and stairwell. the private fenced backyard with fire pit and comfortable patio chairs. large carport and Street side parking
sectionedDescription/description:
This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.Located in the heart of Welch. Part of the Hatfield and McCoy trail system.

this basement apartment is like staying in a cozy nostalgic time capsule. located in a quiet, historic, beautiful Mountainside neighborhood. the extensive Stone walls and stairways is reminiscent of Villas in Italy. 360 degree Mountain views. overlook the river while enjoying the sound.

guess have entire apartment with private entrance and stairwell. the private fenced backyard with fire pit and comfortable patio chairs. large carport and Street side parking

guess can reach me by text or Airbnb messaging or if I am within sight

the neighborhood is composed of many big beautiful older homes. built on four different Mountainside tiers. this is a safe, quiet, friendly residential area. located on the very south east end of Welch. the downtown area is directly down Riverside Drive to the West. there is Renegade Outfitters for Trail Riders. 3 Exxon convenience stores and 1 Exxon gas station. two grocery stores within 3 miles or less. Dollar General and Family Dollar combo Dollar Store. a shoe show. one locally owned thrift store and one antique store all within three miles. the Pocahontas movie theater approximately one mile. McDonald's, KFC, Wendy's, Pizza Hut, Subway fast food restaurants within 3 miles or less. The Howdy house, Sterling Drive In,  spikes dawg house, and three little cupcakes bakery, independently owned restaurants all within six miles or less.

personal vehicle, walking, public transportation. best of all the town of Welch and many surrounding towns are ATV friendly. Therefore you can ride on most streets. trail connector signs are placed well to assist Riders.

there is plenty of ATV traffic on roads around location.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: turn off TV lights coffee maker Etc when gone for any length of time. shut off all electrical items and unplug coffee maker when checking out. Please and thank you
sectionedDescription/interaction: guess can reach me by text or Airbnb messaging or if I am within sight
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: the neighborhood is composed of many big beautiful older homes. built on four different Mountainside tiers. this is a safe, quiet, friendly residential area. located on the very south east end of Welch. the downtown area is directly down Riverside Drive to the West. there is Renegade Outfitters for Trail Riders. 3 Exxon convenience stores and 1 Exxon gas station. two grocery stores within 3 miles or less. Dollar General and Family Dollar combo Dollar Store. a shoe show. one locally owned thrift store and one antique store all within three miles. the Pocahontas movie theater approximately one mile. McDonald's, KFC, Wendy's, Pizza Hut, Subway fast food restaurants within 3 miles or less. The Howdy house, Sterling Drive In,  spikes dawg house, and three little cupcakes bakery, independently owned restaurants all within six miles or less.
sectionedDescription/notes: there is plenty of ATV traffic on roads around location.
sectionedDescription/space: this basement apartment is like staying in a cozy nostalgic time capsule. located in a quiet, historic, beautiful Mountainside neighborhood. the extensive Stone walls and stairways is reminiscent of Villas in Italy. 360 degree Mountain views. overlook the river while enjoying the sound.
sectionedDescription/summary: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.Located in the heart of Welch. Part of the Hatfield and McCoy trail system.
sectionedDescription/transit: personal vehicle, walking, public transportation. best of all the town of Welch and many surrounding towns are ATV friendly. Therefore you can ride on most streets. trail connector signs are placed well to assist Riders.

additionalHouseRules: No cats.   Please don't leave dogs  in the home unattended the garage is fine.  Please avoid pets on the furniture. Smoking is ok outside, please clean up your butts.

name: Black Diamond ATV Lodge
primaryHost/about: I love riding in West Virginia and want to share my place with you
sectionedDescription/access: Full access
sectionedDescription/description:
The Black Diamond ATV Lodge in Welch, WV is the perfect place to stage your next Hatfield McCoy trails adventure.  Consider this your second home as you will have the whole house just for you.  On the main floor there are 3 bedrooms, living room, dining, kitchen, laundry, and bath. See guidebook for more details.

The whole house plus the garage is yours to use

Full access

email at blackdiamondwelchwv@gmail.com

Three major trail heads close by copies of Hatfield maps can be emailed as well as picked up at any pass retailer there are copies in the living room (please leave for the next guest)

Lots of parking  can accommodate three trucks and trailers

Cameras aren’t in use after check in

name: A Bit of Heaven Rental-Cove House-Warrior Trail
photos/0/caption:
Newly Renovated very nice, clean, spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bath, kitchen and living room house. Perfect fit for large groups or small. Convenient for riding HMT trails or outlaw trails.
Quiet neighborhood plenty of parking for trucks and trailers.
photos/1/caption: Spacious living room with a large sectional sofa and extra seating.  Plenty of comfy seating to lounge around  after a day on the trails. Also includes a futon couch that can be used for additional sleeping arrangements.
photos/2/caption: Amenities include a 65" flatscreen TV with Roku access (Netflix, Prime, etc), high speed Wifi and a designated work space.
photos/3/caption:
Fully equipped, large eat in kitchen. 
Perfect for large groups or a small family to dine in during your stay.
photos/5/caption: Maybe one of the most important things in the house. The coffee pot! Both a single serve as well as a regular pot. If you are like me we gotta have our coffee.
photos/6/caption: Bedroom #1 has 2 queen size comfy beds. Extra blankets and fresh linens. It also has a walk in closet and an on Suite adjoining bathroom.
photos/7/caption:
On suite adjoining bathroom with bedroom #1. Clean towels,
Fully stocked with all the necessities soap, shampoo, etc.
photos/8/caption: On suite bathroom 5' ceramic tiled walk in shower for bedroom #1.
photos/9/caption: Bedroom #2 Sleeps 3. 1 comfy queen size bed and 1 single bed. Clean linens and extra blankets. Clothes hanging rod with hangers.
photos/10/caption: 2nd bathroom shared by bedroom two and 3. Fully stocked necessities hair dryer, soap, shampoo, etc.
photos/11/caption: 2nd bathroom 36" ceramic tiled walk in shower.
photos/12/caption: Bedroom #3 has 2 comfy full size beds. Clean linens and extra blankets. Clothes hanging rods with hangers.
photos/13/caption: Laundry area extra large drum washer and dryer to wash riding clothes. Comes complete with laundry soap and a iron.
photos/14/caption: Yes it's true! We have parking to accommodate your trucks, trailers and equipment.
photos/15/caption: Entrance off of War Cove Circle. Well lit with security lights.
photos/16/caption: Covered Patio/Porch with outdoor seating and a gas grill. Perfect for sitting out at night and watching the stars.
photos/17/caption: Enjoy the evenings sitting by the fire pit talking and spending quality time with your family and friends. There's also a set of corn hole boards in the master closet.
photos/18/caption: Electronic lock for easy check in when you arrive.
photos/19/caption: Exterior security cameras for added security
photos/20/caption: Plenty of parking for trucks and trailers
photos/21/caption: Entrance to the house off of War Cove Circle
photos/24/caption:
Rick and I own A Scoop of Heaven
Best icecream in town. Open seasonally April-October. THU-SAT  from 12-9pm. Stop by and say hey and get a 10% discount.
photos/25/caption: ATV friendly town off load when you get here and drive you ATV where ever you want to go. The Owl serves inexpensive but tasty breakfast, lunch and dinner 6 days a week and lunch and opens at noon on Sundays.
photos/26/caption: Warrior Trailhead office sells HMT passes as well as souvenirs. Located on River Rd. Open from 9am-2pm everyday.
photos/29/caption: Berwind Lake
photos/31/caption: War area scenic views
primaryHost/about:
My husband and I relocated to West Virginia in 2014 from Ohio. We run a ministry (A New Beginning) located downtown. 
We opened A Bit of Heaven Rental in Sept. 2018 when the trails opened in our area. We currently have 5 units we rent. We also opened A Scoop of Heaven Icecream in 2021.
We live local across the street from The Calvary House and are available if you need us. We love the small town atmosphere that our town has to offer and the friendly folks that live here.
I love to cook and spend time with our family and grandbabies. 
We enjoy meeting new people, having cookouts in the summer, and going to the lake.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Guest has full access to the house and yard. This property also has a Suite on the backside of the house that can be purchased along with or seperate.
sectionedDescription/description:
Take a step back in time. Rural America. Before fast food chains, and even before Walmart... 

Surrounded by mountains and located right around the corner from Hatfield McCoys Warrior Trailhead.
Enjoy High Rocks, Wilmore Dam, or perhaps a day at Berwind Lake trout fishing, or hiking. 
Easy access to restaurants, gas and grocery store.  We are an ATV friendly town and house is located in friendly quiet Neighborhood with plenty of parking for trucks and trailers.

The Main house features 3 Bedrooms, 2 full baths, open kitchen-dining room, living room and laundry area. It sleeps up to 13 and is fully equipped with clean linens, towels and bedding.
The Master Bedroom has a private Bath with a large tiled shower. The main bathroom is shared between the 2 remaining bedrooms.

Living room has a 65" flat screen TV with Roku access (Netfix, Prime, etc.) and WIFI. It also has a sectional sofa, extra seating, and a small desk workspace. 

Fully equipped kitchen with dishes, flatware and kitchen utensils . Large covered front porch with a Bbq grill and outdoor seating. Fire ring in the yard for those cool evenings back at the house.
This House has a suite on the backside that can be rented with or separate from the House.
Like us on Facebook to stay up to date on what's going on in the area.

Guest has full access to the house and yard. This property also has a Suite on the backside of the house that can be purchased along with or seperate.

Our mission is to make your stay at The Cove House as enjoyable as possible. 

We live locally and respect your privacy.  We'll give you the space that you want or the help you might need.

Located on the entrance to Hatfield McCoys Warrior Trail with direct connections to Pinnacle Creek, Indian Ridge and Pocahantas Trail. Located off 16 WV part of the 91 mile Head of the Dragon Motorcycle Ride, in McDowell County.

Quiet Neighborhood in a welcoming small town with all the conveniences Restaurants,  Grocery store  and gas station.

War is a ATV friendly town, so you can feel free to ride your ATV everywhere during the duration of your stay  or directly to the trail head with no trailering

Day trips in the area:
86 Miles to New River Gorge
64 Miles to Beckley Exibition Coal Miner Youth Museum

**Check out our other Listings**
Cove Suite
The Calvary House
The Calvary Suite

name: Papa's Den Cabin -Hatfield & McCoy Trails
sectionedDescription/access: The entire cabin.
sectionedDescription/description:
Trail Bandits Cabins and Cottages are non-smoking, sleeps up to 4 people and provides all the comforts of home. We are located near the Hatfield & McCoy trails in the Beautiful mountains of West Virginia. Cottages and cabins include Heat / AC mini splits, Free Wi-Fi, mini kitchen, Keurig coffee maker, refrigerator, three-quarter bath, 32” TV with Netflix/Directv, fresh linens, bath towels & housekeeping service. Outdoor fire pit and charcoal grill sit along Tug River. Privacy fence on premises.

Welcome to your home away from home! We’re committed to your comfort and adventure.

We are located with access to the Hatfield & McCoy Indian Ridge, Pinnacle Creek, Pocahontas and Warrior Trails in the Beautiful mountains of West Virginia. You can ride your ATV/SXS directly to the trails from our cabins! 

Our small to mid-size cottages and cabins sleep up to 4 people are efficiency style units with a loft, full size bed and three-quarter bath w/ shower, sink, toilet and towel rack. Heat / AC Mini Split units, Free Wi-Fi, mini kitchen with Keurig coffee-maker, microwave and refrigerator and 32″ Smart TV with Netflix. Charcoal grill, picnic table and firepit outside.

All fresh linens, complimentary soaps, shampoo, conditioner and lotion, bath towels and wash cloths, grilling utensils, toilet paper, paper towels, firewood for the firepit are all included at no additional cost. Our cabins and cottages can be rented as a group, family or vacation getaway

There is also a second cabin “Bear Cabin -Hatfield & McCoy Trails" and a third rental available,  "The Cave- 2 Bedroom Cabin- Hatfield McCoy” on Airbnb as well that sleeps up to 6 people. These cabins are located on the same property like a mini resort. There is plenty of parking for trailers and ATVs / SXS and easy access to Hatfield and McCoy Indian Ridge, Pinnacle Creek, Pocahontas and Warrior Trails.

The entire cabin.

Drive directly to the Hatifield and McCoy trailheads on your SXS. 
Large Parking lot at the cabins.

We pride ourselves on your fun and crazy adventure while staying at Trail Bandits Cabins. Please help us keep it just as fun for our community and our fellow campers. Please read over our rental terms and conditions.

As always, remember to UNLEASH YOUR ADVENTURE!

Our Policy

Cabin rental incidental deposits are non-refundable if your reservation is cancelled with less than 30 days remaining before your arrival date.  Deposits for holiday/holiday weekends are not refundable under any conditions if cancelled.

Reschedule requests will be only be accepted if there are 30 days or longer remaining before your scheduled arrival date.  These requests are subject to availability. * Inclement weather cancellations will not be accepted.

Failure to adhere to your reservation with no communication will forfeit your deposit and you will be charged the remaining balance of your stay.

Cabin Terms and Conditions

Check-in time is 3pm on your arrival date, and check out time is 11am on your departure date. 

Guests will be charged a one time $50 cleaning fee at the time of reservation.

Cabins are non-smoking.  Guests will be charged a one time $250 cleaning fee if smoking is detected inside the cabins and you will forfeit your deposit.

The maximum capacity per standard cabin is 3 adults.  The maximum capacity for our larger cabin is 4 adults.   Violators will be evicted, and no refund will be issued.  Small children will be exempt from this rule. 

Playing on loft ladders is prohibited. Face the ladder when going up or down. Do not carry objects in your hands while on the ladder.

Park ONLY in the designated parking areas which is in front of your cabin or across the road in the grass area.  

Alcohol is permitted.  Disorderly conduct is not allowed.

*No atv or any off road vehicles are allowed in any of the rivers.

Please honor the posted speed limit in our atv community.  

The reserving guests will be responsible for any damages to your cabin or premises. 

Please do not place, burn or leave trash in your fire pit. Outside charcoal grills need to be cleaned prior to the departure of your stay.

We ask that all guest respect your fellow campers and community. 

Quiet the noise after 10:00pm for respect of the community and other campers.

No excessive riding in the cabin areas or driveways.   No driving or parking your ATV on the grass where the charcoal grills and picnic tables are located.

There are outdoor surveillance cameras around the campground for the protection of your items.

Ready to Reserve!

You must reserve with an incidental deposit of $250. Incidental deposits are refundable upon checkout as long as there are no damages or additional charges made. If additional charges or damages occur during your stay, you will receive the incidental deposit back less the cost of damages or additional charges. Cabins cannot be reserved and will not be held without a deposit.

All rentals require a 2-night minimum.

Pet Friendly – We love Pets!

Trail Bandits Cabins offers pet friendly cabins. 

Pets that are non-aggressive are allowed with a $50 per pet surcharge per night.  No more than 1 pet is allowed per cabin unless approved by host to have more.

All pets must be registered at check-in. If not registered and found on the premises, you will be evicted and deposit forfeited.

Excessive barking that is a disturbance to other campers will not be allowed.  

**Pets must be crated if left alone.

Pets should be on a leash at all times while outside. Please clean up any waste left by your pet.

Reserving guest is responsible for any damages caused by pets. If any damages occur, incidental deposit will be forfeited.

Pets must be 40 pounds or less due to insurance restrictions and campground policy procedures.

Cottages and cabins include Heat / AC mini splits, Free Wi-Fi, mini kitchen, Keurig coffee maker, refrigerator, three-quarter bath, 32” TV with Netflix/Directv, fresh linens, bath towels & housekeeping service. Outdoor fire pit and charcoal grill sit along Tug River. Privacy fence on premises.
sectionedDescription/transit:
Drive directly to the Hatifield and McCoy trailheads on your SXS. 
Large Parking lot at the cabins.

name: The Cave- 2 Bedroom Cabin- Hatfield McCoy
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Plenty of parking
sectionedDescription/description:
The Cave is the perfect cabin for your family! It sleeps 4 but will accommodate up to 6 people. 2nd bedroom includes 12 inch pillow top Queen bed . (1) Three-quarter bathroom includes shower, sink, toilet and towel rack. Master bedroom has a 12 inch full size bed. (2) Master bathroom access from the master bedroom. All fresh linens, complimentary soaps, shampoo, conditioner and lotion, bath towels and wash cloths and firewood for fire pit included. Privacy fence on premises.

Welcome to your home away from home! We’re committed to your comfort and adventure.

We are located with access to the Hatfield & McCoy Indian Ridge, Pinnacle Creek, Pocahontas and Warrior Trails in the Beautiful mountains of West Virginia. You can ride your ATV/SXS directly to the trails from our cabins! Whether you come to ride the trails, hiking, fishing, hunting or a romantic getaway; this is your home away from home!

The Cave cabin sleeps 4 but will accommodate up to 6 people. 2nd bedroom includes 12 inch pillow top Queen bed. (1) Three-quarter bathroom includes shower, sink, toilet and towel rack. Master bedroom has a 12 inch full size Gel-Infused green tea memory foam mattress with cooling gel foam bed. (2) Master bathroom access from the master bedroom with shower, toilet, sink and towel rack. There is room for an air mattress and / or sleeping bags in the living area. The couch has 2 recliners that lay all the way back to relax while watching movies. Living room with 42” Smart TV with Netflix, an eat-in full-size Kitchen with stove, sink, microwave, Keurig coffee maker and refrigerator. Heat/ A/C mini split unit, Free Wi-Fi. Fire pit, picnic table on large back porch and outdoor charcoal grills on premises.

All fresh linens, complimentary soaps, shampoo, conditioner and lotion, bath towels and wash cloths, grilling utensils, kitchen cookware (larger cabin), toilet paper, paper towels, firewood for the firepit are all included at no additional cost. Our cabins and cottages can be rented as a group, family or vacation getaway!

Plenty of parking

We will be available to you if you need anything during your stay! We are only a phone call away!

We have plenty of parking. If you’re coming to ride the Hatfield & McCoy trails there is no need to trailer your SXS or UTV. You can ride directly to the trails from the cabin.

primaryHost/about:
My husband and I relocated to West Virginia in 2014 from Ohio. We run a ministry (A New Beginning) located downtown. 
We opened A Bit of Heaven Rental in Sept. 2018 when the trails opened in our area. We currently have 5 units we rent. We also opened A Scoop of Heaven Icecream in 2021.
We live local across the street from The Calvary House and are available if you need us. We love the small town atmosphere that our town has to offer and the friendly folks that live here.
I love to cook and spend time with our family and grandbabies. 
We enjoy meeting new people, having cookouts in the summer, and going to the lake.

sectionedDescription/description:
Take a step back in time. Rural America. Before fast food chains, and even before Walmart...
Surrounded by mountains and located right around the corner from the Hatfield McCoy Warrior Trailhead office.
Enjoy High Rocks, Wilmore Dam or perhaps a day at Berwind Lake trout fishing, hiking or boating. 
Easy access to restaurants, gas station, and grocery store. We are an ATV friendly town and House is located in quiet friendly neighborhood with plenty of parking.

Features 2 bedrooms, 1 full bath with washer and dryer, Eat in galley kitchen living room.
it sleeps 6 and is fully equipped with clean linens, towels and bedding.
The bathroom features a 36" ceramic tile shower. 
Livingroom has a 55" Roku flat screen TV and Wifi. It also has a sofa and chair.
Fully equipped kitchen with dishes, flatware and kitchen utensils. Covered front porch with Bbq grill and outdoor seating. 
Look us up on Facebook to stay up to date on what's going on in the area.

Guest had full access to the house andside yard. This property also had an adjoining property on the front that can be booked as a combination for large groups or booked seperate.

very quiet Neighborhood

ATV friendly town, you are welcome e to ride your ATV in town.

The Cove Suite

name: Cozy Two Bedroom Apartment located in Welch
photos/14/caption: Guests have access to the front yard
photos/15/caption: View from the front door
primaryHost/about: My wife Elise and I have lived in McDowell County since November 2015. We moved from New England to help the community through outreach and ministry and we've fallen in love with the area and the people here. We love to go for walks, listen to music, travel anywhere & everywhere, and meet new friends.
sectionedDescription/access: Enjoy the scenic mountain view from our quiet and cozy front porch. Park right in front of the residence. It is a two minute walk from downtown Welch.
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy the modern and vintage charm of our 1920's home. Located in the heart of McDowell County in Welch, West Virginia. We take pride in offering the most comfortable hypoallergenic bedding for a wonderful night's sleep and the softest towels so our guests will have a lavish experience.

This apartment is located in a home with an additional unit across the hall and it is above another apartment. It is located across the way from City Hall and the Welch Library.

We thoroughly clean and disinfect after each guest's stay. The cleaners and detergents used on our property are eco-friendly, sustainable and biodegradable.

Enjoy the scenic mountain view from our quiet and cozy front porch. Park right in front of the residence. It is a two minute walk from downtown Welch.

As hosts, we are always available for any assistance and advice while guests navigate the area.

There is truly no other place like Welch, WV. Once a booming coal town, Welch now has a much smaller population. Welch and McDowell County have garnered much attention over the past decade. The New York Times and CNN have published and produced different pieces highlighting the county and its unique way of life that still exists here in the mountains. Even the late chef, author, and documentarian, Anthony Bourdain spent time filming in McDowell and was quoted saying it was one of the most unique places he had traveled to.
 https://www.wvpress.org/breaking-news/anthony-bourdain-mcdowell-best-place-earth/

You can see McDowell County's episode on season 11 of Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown.

This home is within walking distance to a gas station, a library, town hall and the movie theatre. The Jack Caffrey Arts and Culture Center is a short distance away. Small shops, grocery stores and restaurants are all one to five miles away. There is a Bluefield Area Transit Bus route that runs through town on weekdays.

There is no kitchen in this unit. There is a key code for the front door of the house and for the apartment door. There are stairs  leading to this apartment.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
We prefer no shoes in the apartment. 
Please leave beds unmade.

sectionedDescription/description: Cabin located near Hatfield & McCoy trails!! Approximately 6 miles from Warrior Trail #11. Welch is ATV friendly so you can ride your ATV the whole 6 miles. No need to pull your trailer!! The cabin is also very close to Outlaw trails! Plenty of parking!! Super nice fire pit to relax by after a full day of riding the beautiful trails!!! We now offer WIFI and a gas grill!! Please bring sheets and towels!!
sectionedDescription/summary: Cabin located near Hatfield & McCoy trails!! Approximately 6 miles from Warrior Trail #11. Welch is ATV friendly so you can ride your ATV the whole 6 miles. No need to pull your trailer!! The cabin is also very close to Outlaw trails! Plenty of parking!! Super nice fire pit to relax by after a full day of riding the beautiful trails!!! additionalHouseRules:
Minimum age to rent is 25 years old.  Maximum guests are 22

No Smoking on property. Refundable deposit will not be returned if there is any sign of smoking or cigarette butts are left on the property. 

No events, parties, kegs or excessive drinking allowed. This is not the house for you if you intend to have a party. You may be asked to leave and no refund will be provided if there is an event, party or excessive drinking occurs. There are cameras monitoring the home. 

No pets allowed in the homes or on the property during your stay. 

Any issues with the house must be reported upon arrival. 
All checkout procedures must be completed before leaving.
Any damage or issues that occurred during your stay must be reported before checking out.

Any disregard for house rules may result in termination of the rental agreement and guests will be asked to leave before the end of the scheduled stay and will not be provided any refund.
